title: Everything great and friendly
text:
Very pleasant stay. We had to book at the last minute because we had booked elsewhere which turned out to be horrible. 
We were greeted by Hilton very warmly, they made sure everything went perfectly.
Bed was super comfortable, all staff friendly and free coffee every morning, which is always nice to have!
Subway just in front of the hotel, 2 mins walk to ferry station. 
Highly recommend this hotel. Special thanks to Martin at the front desk :)

title: Really nice staff, good comfortable room, pleasant experience
text:
4.5
Pros: 
Clean
Comfortable bed
Lots of different size pillows
Good hot shower/bath
Water view (in the less expensive rooms, even, we just asked!)
Best- incredible staff at desk, in housekeeping, restaurant, bar (amazing drinks) and engineering/maintenance.  
Other than tax and $3.50 NYC charge- no hidden fees
Free morning coffee in lobby and second floor
Steps to Whitehall subway station and SI Ferry, Ferries to Liberty and Ellis Islands
Shampoo, conditioner, body lotion in good amounts and real soap
12 Noon check out
Cons:
The little coffee machine thing in our room was pretty dirty, still had a used pod in it (lobby and restaurant was better anyway)
Stuff:
View helicopters headed over Statue of Liberty can get noisy in AM (not real early), construction on adjoining road (Sept '23) but Sunday AM is heaven, though, sleep nice and late-

Very pleased with this hotel.  Really excellent staff pushed the rating to 5. Will return. (With the Hilton honors credit card, I think - didn't tend to stay in them often!)

title: Excelente hotel!
text: Hotel con muy buena ubicación. La atención recibida de parte de Martin desde nuestra llegada y durante toda la estadia fue excelente. Pudimos utilizar el gimnasio. Destacamos la limpieza diaria de la habitación. No tenemos ninguna queja todo fue muy satisfactorio.

title: Great customer Service
text: Really love the friendly service here. Extremely helpful at check in.……..got to mention and a Big Shout out for Fernando in the bar. What an asset to the hotel. Lovely manner, really chatty and made our first night in NY (we are exhausted) really enjoyable……we’ll see him in the bar tomorrow night!

title: Great!
text: We stayed at this hotel from the 25th to the 30th, the rooms were great, and it was overall a nice experience, especially the the lady at the reception, i believe her name was Nakita Heidi, she was really nice to us!, we will definitely be back!!

title: Small and Higher Priced; but Okay...
text:
We had a couple snafu's that the staff handled reasonably well. The room was smaller than Im used to, the wardrobe was TOO TINY and had a caddy for an iron that I had removed as you couldn't hang anything in it with the caddy there! 
Martin and Laura at the front desk were great! Joann in the restaurant for breakfast was amazing! A few of the non-English speaking staff were more interested in their phones and being rude while walking through common areas, in and out of elevators, etc., but housekeeping and the front desk were good! All in all, we had a good experience.

title: The Vikings great New York superbowl adventure
text:
Really enjoyed our stay , room was clean, tidy and comfortable, cleaned every day to a high standard. We had 2 minor bathroom faults that occurred but were dealt with quickly and efficiently.
Lobby area was warm and welcoming, At the reception desk,Victor and Nakita were awesome, real stars ,helped with anything we needed and gave great tips to local spots for food, shopping and bars . Just 2 really nice people and an asset for the hotel. Just 10 minutes walk to 9/11 memorial and 
15 minutes walk to Brooklyn bridge, a great location for travelling to up town manhattan , 20 minutes to Central Park by train or over to Brooklyn with travel options 2 minutes walk from the front entrance. We will stay here again.

title: Super recommended
text: The location is very useful for a trip where you want to see the entire city. There are metro stations of different lines very close to the hotel. If you can include breakfast, it is worth it because it is very well served. The service in the restaurant was very good and also at reception, you can understand each other in Spanish and English. Your stay will be excellent if you are attended to by Martín, Laura or Jacquanna.

title: Great time thank you to the staff
text: Great time and amazing staff. Special shout-out to Victor at the front desk and Fernando at the bar for making my stay! I would definitely recommend anyone to stop by. I came here for business trip and now I don’t want to leave. The rooms are super clean.

title: Great location and helpful staff
text: Victor and Nakita were amazing helpful staff with room accommodations and local activities in the area.  Hotel location is perfect walking to the pier and great local restaurants.  Public garage is pricey but lots options available and easy to walk to from hotel.

title: 100% satisfied... great stay, great staff
text:

I highly recommend this hotel, and I have stayed at Marriotts, Wyndham (not even close), and Hyatt in the past.

In my opinion Hilton is still number one and having a great front desk that greats people with a smile is worth it's weight in gold.

And the area is alive with activity.

Peace and Love to everyone.

Sincerely,
James Wagner

Out room was clean and bright with part harbour view too. The most important thing is bedding, bed sheets is silky and pillows are soft and fluffy. I will definitely come back for next trip.

title: I found the greatest Front desk customer service rep at the Hilton Honors FIDI
text:
Hi, you guys have a gold mine customer service front desk of Nakita & Heidi,  It was mainly Nakita,  Her CS is top notch, golden, amazing, super friendly and very courteous.  She has a smile that lights up a room! Do you know how great this Girl is?  If not let me tell you.  She started our conversion with a funny joke to lighten up how confused I was if I was at the right hotel.  She made me feel very comfortable and I noticed how at ease I was talking to this girl.  She found my reservation mediately and just did her bet to accommodate me in finding a room.  I honestly don't think you guys know how rare it is to find someone like Nakita on board the front desk.  

Normally I find a front desk person literally hating their job and wishes you can be out of their face asap.  Not Nakita, her & Heidi were attentive to everyone who they came in contact with and with a beautiful smile. They are top notch of their game! Nakita did not skip a beat! Heidi was just as alert and as soon as there were people behind me to check in they came full force to make sure, "yes you are our number one priority!"  

I am so tired of how I would get treated with the long faces and mandatory "I have to be nice to the customer". but these two girls are pure magic.  You can obviously tell They love their job and really want to make sure everyone that was coming and going has a great time at the hotel.  You honestly can't find genuine people l ike these two but Nakita is the star of the show and I hope you guys treat her right because if you don't i definitely know how to snag a great person and give them a way better opportunity.  

It was very refreshing to talk to the both of them.

Please don't lose her! She's a keeper! Just make sure you don't let her go!

title: Hotels are built on people-- this is a gem of a Hotel
text: This is the second time we've stayed  at this hotel  in six weeks ,this time for five nights.   Like last time it was great and  it remains  one of our favorite hotels in NYC, a great Hilton property.   The rates a reasonable, the location is fantastic  but most of all the staff is great.   Heidi and Nakita, and everyone else at the front end were super nice and helpful. And  housekeeping staff (who seldom get mentioned) -- Louisa and Stephania-- were great.  Even the bartender, Fernando was great.  Martin at the front end arranged a car back to JFK that worked our really well and was reasonable. This is a great hotel.  I also want to shout out again to An Phan their  manager, who is super helpful and accommodating.  Hotels are built on people, and this one gets my highest rating.  I'm a diamond member and stay in a lot of Hilton branded properties, and this one is a gem.

title: Great stay
text: Nakita, Victor, and Shantel were extremely helpful and accommodating! I enjoyed my stay and the view of the river was great. Our rooms were cleaned during our busy days and I would absolutely stay here again. Thank you Hilton Garden Inn and Nakita, Victor, and Shantel!

title: We absolutely loved our stay at the hotel. Very well located, clean and comfortable rooms. Staff was very kind
text:
Out stay at Hilton Garden Inn Financial Center was perfect. Rooms were very clean and comfortable. Location of the hotel is great, very close to the subway and ferry to the statue of liberty.

Ann was very mind and managed to provide early check-in in a rainy day and was always willing to help us with any questions we might have

title: Perfect location, wonderful staff, clean and impeccable
text: Our stay at the hotel was flawless from check-in to check-out. The staff was exceptionally friendly and helpful, and our room was spotlessly clean and well-maintained, complete with essential amenities like a microwave, fridge, and coffee maker. We cleverly used the coffee maker as a kettle for hot water when needed. We were pleasantly surprised by the complimentary tea and coffee capsules and sustainable cups provided. Although the microwave was convenient, we recommend bringing ceramic plates and cups for optimal use. Despite the availability of bottled water at the gym, we found the tap water in New York City to be perfectly fine. The elevators were remarkably fast, and the laundry service on the ground floor was convenient. Our room on the 24th floor offered a stunning city view, and the air conditioning system was quiet with easy temperature controls. The sound isolation was excellent, providing a peaceful environment. We appreciated the discreet room cleaning service and the availability of toiletries. The comfortable bed and ample TV channels, including many in Spanish, added to our satisfaction. The lobby was recently renovated and well-maintained, allowing us to relax with the window slightly open. Overall, we are grateful to the Hilton team for a wonderful experience.

title: Nice experience!
text:
Excellent from all point of view: room, personal, bar, location of the hotel, view from my window. Also I got a very good price (considering the overall price of hotels in New York). Coffe in the room and also in the lobby! Close to underground stations. 
In conclusion: I will definitely be back here if I find another good deal!

title: Great staff

title: Tolle Erfahrung!
text:
Das Hotel befindet sich in Lower Manhattan, unterhalb des Financial District, an sehr schöner Lage. Ganz Lower Manhattan, insbesondere die Wall Street, WTC und Battery Park mit der Fähre nach Brooklyn, Staten Island und Liberty Island ist sehr gut zu Fuss erreichbar, die restliche Stadt ist per Subway (drei Stationen in direkter Nähe) ebenfalls sehr gut und schnell erreichbar. Im Quartier sind diverse Läden und Restaurants zu finden und es hat uns hier an nichts gefehlt. Nachts haben wir von Midtown aus Sicherheitsgründen jeweils ein Uber für die Rückfahrt zum Hotel genutzt. Wir haben in der Subway zwar keine schlechte Erfahrung gemacht und alles war friedlich und schien sicher, aber wir wollten das auch nicht ändern. Die Nächte waren für NYC sehr ruhig. Natürlich hat man auch hier einen gewissen Citysound, aber er war absolut erträglich und wir schliefen wunderbar.

Der Empfang im Hotel durch Nakita und Victor war herzlich und wir fühlten uns sofort wohl. Das Hotel macht einen sauberen und gepflegten Eindruck und unser Zimmer war sehr sauber. Das Boxspringbett hatte einen perfekten Härtegrad und bescherte uns sieben sehr geruhsame Nächte. Auch das Reinigungspersonal war sehr freundlich, als wir zwei Mal Kontakt zu ihnen hatten, weil wir noch im Zimmer waren, als die Zimmerreinigung nach dem Frühstück erfolgte. A propos Frühstück: Dieses kann zwischen 7 - 10 Uhr im Hotelrestaurant eingenommen werden und ist sehr reichhaltig. Man hat die Auswahl zwischen dem Buffet und einer reichhaltigen Karte. Beides war sehr gut und kann uneingeschränkt empfohlen werden. Auch der Service war jeweils freundlich und zuvorkommend.

Beim absolut problemlosen Check-Out bot uns der Empfangsmitarbeiter Martin proaktiv an, einen günstigen Wagen eines Partnerunternehmens für den Flughafentransfer zu organisieren, was dann auch reibungslos funktionierte. Zwischen Check-Out (möglich bis Mittag) und Abreise konnten wir unsere Koffer kostenlos bei der Rezeption deponieren.

Alles in allem waren wir mit unserer Hotelwahl sehr zufrieden und würden das Hilton Garden Inn NYC Financial Center in Manhattan Downtown NYC uneingeschränkt weiterempfehlen. Vielen Dank für diese Erfahrung, stay safe!

title: Great option, no regrets
text: The location is very well located to move all around New York without being in crowded areas, is very clean, the staff was very friendly and helpful at all times specially Martin , Shantel and Imvan …as well the restaurant staff in the morning.

title: 👍👍👍 NYC HIG FD 👍👍👍

Especially Ann, Martin and shantel were very helpful . We enjoyed our stay at the hotel. Location is brilliant, easy access to subway and other public transport.

title: MEJOR IMPOSIBLE
text:
El hotel, está muy bien ubicado, en una zona maravillosa, tranquila, segura y moderna, además super cerca de estaciones de  Metro, trenes y buses. Frente al Ferry y el Battery park donde se pueden observar los atardeceres mas lindo de NY. Cerca hay muchas zonas de comidas, un Duane/  walgreens, oficina de correos FEDEX, cafés y restaurantes, además de un marketplace que abre 24 H. 

 La habitación es pequeña, pero muy cómoda, la cama y las almohadas son espectaculares, es muy limpio, las vistas preciosas, pero lo mejor es el personal, todos son maravillosos, súper colaboradores. Victor y Nakita, Gracias por recibirme cordialmente, estar siempre dispuestos a colaborar y preocuparse por mis cajas :)  Nakita siempre  con una sonrisa. Laura un placer conocerte muy atenta igualmente  Imran y Rafael excelentes colaboradores muy dispuestos a ayudar. Todo el equipo es maravilloso. 

En el Lobby hay estación de café en las mañanas, te brindan agua, te limpian la habitación diariamente y las chicas del aseo también son muy serviciales. El hotel cuenta con restaurante y GYM y un  business center donde puedes imprimir documentos que a mi me sirvió mucho para mi viaje de negocios. Adicional en el cuarto, la calefacción funciona muy bien, hay nevera y microondas.

Estoy plenamente agradecida con todos,  y espero volver pronto. mi estadía ha sida aún mas agradable gracias a la atención de todo el personal.

GRACIAS :)

title: Wonderful place to stay.
text:
Quick tl;dr: This hotel’s great, stay here.

Less quick: We stay in a lot of Hilton properties when we come up to the city, but I don’t think we’re ever going to stay elsewhere after this. The hotel is clean and comfortable despite the ongoing renovation, and the amenities offered are wonderful - shampoo, conditioner, body wash, and lotion are all available in bottle form in your room. TV works well, beds are very comfortable (not to mention the views overlooking Governor’s Island). The real standout here, though, is the staff - Nakita, Ashley, Shanel, and Rafael were some of the first folks we encountered, and they not only put us in a great mood (seriously, you guys rock), but also were able to give us recommendations that even as a returning native, I wouldn’t have thought about. Victor and A were on hand for everything as well, and Jaquan solved the one hiccup we had our entire stay thus far in about two seconds (we ran out of conditioner). Don’t sleep on the bar, either - when Vanessa’s working, it’s one of the most economical choices for later night drinks and conversation. We went once and ended up going back again - the crew here is just that good. We’ll be staying here again and recommending to friends. 10/10 experience staying here.

text: Primeiro de tudo, queria muito elogiar a atendente front desk Wanda. Que atendimento impecável, atencioso e merecedor de tudo de bom. O hotel é ótimo, do lado do State Island Ferry (deve ser ótimo e muito procurado em época de maratona de Nova Iorque) e próximo de metrô das linhas 1 e R que dão fácil acesso ao uptown.
