title: Hotel Surpassed our Expectations!!
text: We chose this hotel for a family trip to NYC during the holidays. We had no idea exactly where it was located, but we usually enjoy staying a little ways away from midtown which being in the financial district we knew it checked that box. The location was absolutely perfect; right across the street from the Staten Island Ferry. Upon arriving, we were surprised with two rooms with a king size beds rather than the one room with two double beds that we booked. Being that we were traveling with our two adult daughters, this was a rather welcome upgrade. The rooms were spacious, clean & one was overlooking the water. We were all offered bottled waters upon our arrival. While all we did was sleep in this hotel, we couldn't have been happier with our choice. Our room was ready when we arrived long before check in & our luggage was happily held by the hotel after we checked out. There is a garage steps away from the hotel to park your car. The subway is literally across the street. More convenient we couldn't have asked for! We will definitely stay here again!!

title: Five star service!
text:
The service extended by the hotel's team (in particular, Martin, Jaquanna, An and Niquita) was up to par with the best 5 star hotels!  They made a point of getting to know their guests, which helped them meet all of our needs  
My husband and I stayed for almost three weeks, and immediately felt at home from day one.

title: Convenient and Pleasant Stay
text: Always a pleasant stay.  I stay here when I come home to visit my family that lives in Brooklyn, it’s conveniently close and the staff is always friendly and welcoming.  Especially Martin who is helpful with the bags and always smiling.  An is also very helpful and kind.  It’s nice to arrive and have a friendly staff greet you after a long flight.

title: Hospitaliy and quality of service
text: Good hotel and facilities quite good, comfort room, have a good small bar, comfort lobby, the staff very helpful and so friendly. Have a variety of breakfast, and have good view through the window side. Positions near to subway station. So its easy to access. And nearby many food places that you can reach.

title: Great location in the financial district!
text: Highly recommend! A great location close to the red and yellow lines and in the financial district. A lot of great breakfast and restaurant/bars in the area. Also the Staten Island Ferry is across the street. Great views of the water and the front desk was super friendly and helpful!

title: Great Staff
text:
perfect location to walk to South Street Seaport , Staten Island Ferry, Oculus,911 Memorial, Restaurants, SoHo, NoHo . 
Nikita welcomed our family in. 
I accidentally made a double booking and she was able to rectify my problem with ease. Nikita gets a Gold Star for Hospitality, she also helped us wheel down our luggage to the car. Her personality makes you want to come back to the Hilton ! 
Victor was also very helpful in checking us in with any questions we had ! Amazing customer service !  Only one thing I called down for 2 extra towels but never received them. No Biggie at that point . The staff was A plus !

title: Amazing customer Service
text: Nakita and An went above and beyond to assist my husband and I, the best customer service I've had at a hotel in NYC. Thank you for everything we will Def be back! I highly recommend this hotel, it's clean, amazing staff and the hotel bar is a great addition.

title: Great Stay
text: Third time staying in NYC and have to say this hotel has been the best so far. Room and bathroom are spacious and the hotel is really close to the station. Staff Nakita Rafaet and Ashley were great!!!

title: For me not worth the $500 a night in December
text: So let me start out by saying my company pays when I travel.  I had to stay the night in NYC (from NJ) for 1 night to attend a XMAS work party in the area.  This location sit across from my clients location.  Price was $500+ for one night.  Yes great location, LIsland Ferry right across street, close to Wall Street and other things.  Lets stay on the hotel...like every typical NY hotel it was noisy outside (sirens all night)...then I was put in room 2405..which is directly across from the elevators (yes bad luck) and it was noisy from people talking coming in and out of elevators...the room its self was nice 2 beds work desk tv,...shower at night took long time and barely got hot, and in the morning it was scorching hot...the carpets on my floor we not very clean.....check in was quick, and they were very professional with info on hotel etc....for that type of money I expected more.

title: Great
text:
Our stay was really good. The only thing the heat didnt work properly. But overall it was clean and comfortable. Good location in the financial district. Close to the subway. 
Martin the bellman was really mindful with our luggage, very helpful with locations and he was friendly and always in a good disposition. Thank you :)

title: Gem in financial district
text:
Very friendly, helpful staff! 
Martin, Jacquanna and Imram make sure that our stay was comfortable. Very comfy bed, clean room with regular servicing. On arrival plenty of information giving re: attractions to visit in Manhattan and information how to get around. Staff greeted us when we came and went from hotel to ensure they could help with anything we needed. Great location handy to 3 different subway lines, Staten island ferry, statue of liberty and 9/11 memorial.

title: Great price great service
text: This place is great! Best price great service. The staff was amazingly friendly had great suggestions for eating near by and helping you navigate uptown. It was hard to say goodbye to good people. Special thanks to Martin, Shantel and Joquanna.

title: Excelente servicio
text: Me encanto el hotel, en especial el trato de Latia una persona muy amable y servicial. El hotel tiene muy buena ubicación, esta en muy buen estado. Además se notaba que se preocupan por la limpieza, el cuarto muy agradable y la cama deliciosa.

title: Great hotel. Awesome staff
text:
This is a great hotel with a perfect location if you plan to visit Manhattan along with other southeast neighborhoods (like Brooklyn).
Latia at the reception was wonderful from the moment we arrived and made us feel welcome at all times.
The hotel is well kept and clean.

title: Great stay, absolutely recommended
text:
We visited NYC in October 2023 and chose this hotel for the second time after our stay in 2022. No disappointment, we had a great stay again. It has an excellent location in Downtown Manhattan, right at the Financal District. For us it was the perfect "ground zero" for exploring New York. Not so busy like the Uptown, still has everything closeby: Staten Island Ferry, Subway Line 1, the Battery Park, diners and of course the historical Wall Street. 
This time at the arrival we had some issue with the room, but Wanda at the reception was really flexible and solved our problem quickly. We appreciate it! The hotel is clean, well equipped, nothing luxurious, but the attention of the staff with Martin-An is a five star. 
About NYC? Well, you have to be there to feel it, so go ahead, book this hotel and enjoy!

title: Thank you for an exceptional experience
text:
My wife and I routinely make trips several times per year to NYC and we usually stay at this hotel. We have stayed here since 2018 and continue to come back. We have been very happy with the hotel itself and the staff have been great. This time they went over and above to exceed our expectations and I wanted to make it a point to write about our experience. 

This trip started out differently. We arrived late on the 23rd after our flight was delayed. When we arrived at the hotel we met Nakita at the front desk. We were told that the room we had booked (1 king bed) was unavailable at that they had only rooms with double beds available. We were very upset. We had planned this stay and booked months in advanced. We were very disappointed that the room we booked was not available. When we went up to the first room it was unfortunately not ready for guests and we had to go back and change rooms. Nakita was professional and tried her best to make things right. She said someone would call us between 9 and 10 am the next day to follow up.

The next day, exactly as promised we were called to let us know that the room we had booked was available. We were thrilled. We felt heard. We felt that the staff had made a promise to get back to us and help make things right - and they did exactly that. We ended up just staying in the room we were in and let the staff know we were happy with how they handled things. On top of that the front desk staff helped get us a late check out so luckily we could go directly to the airport. On our way out the manager met us to ensure our stay went well and we thanked him. 

Every time we passed by the front desk or came in and out from exploring the city or shopping we were always greeted with a smile.

We really appreciated how we were treated. It was a frustrating situation to begin with but their team made it right. We wanted to pass on our compliments to the whole team at the hotel for our stay. Everyone we encountered from the cleaning staff to maintenance to dining staff to the front desk was warm and professional. It did not go unnoticed. We will definitely be coming back here and recommending this hotel to all of our friends and family. Thank you for an excellent experience.

title: Nice hotel to recommend
text: The hotel location is great along Water Street & easy assess to Commercial Building & restaurants as well as subway station. The staffs are supper nice with warm welcome and take care of you. There are different breakfast choices to pick every morning. The room & facilities are very clean. This is my second time to stay, will come back more.

title: Nice BYC hotel
text: We had 3 rooms for a Thanksgiving visit. Except for the heat being hard to regulate, our experience was great. We had clean rooms and good service when we needed engineering or housekeeping. The location was not bustling, but within a 5-10 minute walk there were restaurants and a drug store.  It is very close to subway stops.

title: Probably one of the best value places to stay downtown.
text: I like the nice rooms and location. Room was a little dated though. Price was okay given that location was near the subway and ferry. Overall a good choice to stay in Manhattan. Wasnt too crowded around the area at night too.

title: Awsome Serivce by Staff
text:
The staff was incredibly helpful, specially Martin, Jaquanna, and Ann. They gave us the best recommendations on where to eat, where to go, and what to avoid around the area.

One day, during our stay, we lost an iPhone charger. Martin managed to get us a backup one so that we have everything we needed for having a great time.

Thanks to the staff for your awesome service.

title: Ótima experiência
text:
Ótima localização, hotel próximo a diversas linhas/estações de metrô, farmácias, supermercados e restaurantes . Quarto confortável e sempre limpo. 
Funcionários prestativos e sempre muito simpáticos.

title: Nice place, well located and very good service at reception desk
text: Well located hotel, nice rooms and very nice welcome and service at the reception desk. In particular from Martin Jaquanny.  Beds very comfortable. Only mitigation for the shower which was a little old fashioned. Location was very good : close to Staten Ferry, subway and Wall Street

title: Angenehmer Aufenthalt
text:
Es war ein sehr angenehmer Aufenthalt. An der Rezeption waren Martin und Shantel gut gelaunt und immer hilfsbereit wenn Fragen aufgetaucht sind.
Die Lage ist toll mit einer guten Sicht aufs Wasser und gutem Anschluss zum Subway system.

title: Should be re-branded to Motel Six
text:
Very small Spartan rooms. 
The Internet is completely unusable. 
The door to the bathroom maladjusted dragging the floor tried to get it fixed ...no response over four days. 
Fawcet was falling out of the vanity top...completely lose. 
They did get that fixed. 
The carpet is frayed, and wallpaper is falling off the walls. 
There was channel no guide for the TV. 
I asked at the front desk over 4 days and never could get information about the channel lineup. 
I wanted to watch a financial program on CNBC....they just could not understand ...they keep giving me directions for ESPN. ...and this is about half a mile from Wall St.! 
This is absolutely the most spartan low bid Hilton I have ever seen and at $420 a night. 
These rooms compare favorably with an upscale Motel Six 
Also, the wayward elevator would randomly go astray. 
However, the breakfast in the second-floor dining room is quite good. 
Service is very fast, and the staff were very nice.
Obviously, we will never stay there again.

title: Staff are excellent
text:
We loved this hotel.It is down in the financial district which is a bit quieter.The front of house staff were absolutely amazing.Shantel and Martin looked after us so we’ll.There was also a young lady who checked us in ( we didn’t get her name ) who made us feel so welcome after a whole day travelling from Scotland.
Our room was overlooking the Staten Island ferry terminal.Room was very comfortable and clean.
There is a subway station right beside hotel that will get you to Times Square in about 20 minutes.Also a short walk away is the pier where you can get the ferry to Brooklyn and various other boat trips.
There’s a couple of nice bars very close to the hotel.
All in all we highly recommend this hotel.

title: Clean hotel and friendly front desk
text: This is a nice, clean hotel. The room was perfectly spacious and comfortable - quiet as well. Front desk lady was very nice and accommodating. It is also nice that the checkout is at 12 PM. I would stay here again, as the location is close to Wall Street and the Pier 11 ferry stop.

title: Great stay
text: Wonderful 4 night stay.  Hotel staff very helpful and friendly.  They let us have our room early and stored our luggage before our flight home.  Comfortable and very clean.  Would definitely stay there again.  It is a great location to explore New York with transport and restaurants nearby.

title: Grateful, grateful, grateful.
text: Latia genuinely blew my mind. I can’t believe how well my fiancé and I were taken care of. Highly recommend retaining latia till the end of days. Thank you so much! Wow I mean huh??? I feel so lucky. Seriously.

title: sehr kundenorientiert, flexibel bei Sonderwünschen
text:
Ende September waren wir in New York und hatten uns insbesondere wegen der Lage (Nähe zu den Fähren und zum Battery Park) für das Hilton Garden Inn entschieden.

Eine gute Entscheidung. Wir kamen bei strömendem Regen an, die U-Bahnen waren wegen Wassereinbruch geschlossen. Vorzeitig konnten wir unser Zimmer im 19 Stock mit Blick aufs sonst sehr gern gesehene Wasser. Auch beim Check-Out und ein paar anderen Wünschen kam uns das freundliche Team um Martin, Wanda & Naicha entgegen und fand gute Lösungen für uns.

Lediglich die nicht wirklich geräusch- und geruchsdichte Schiebetür zum Bad fanden wir suboptimal. Toll hingegen, dass man die Fenster öffnen konnte und so nicht zwingend auf die Klimaanlage angewiesen war. Der Zimmerservice war exzellent.

Hervorheben möchten wir auch den guten Diner im 2. Stock. Man erwartet nicht all zu viel von einer Hotelbar, aber sowohl die Gerichte (besonders die Nacho-Vorspeise mit Koriander) als auch die Getränke (drei Biere vom Fass, gute Longdrinks & Cocktails) haben uns überzeugt.

Fazit: Wir kommen gerne wieder

title: Clean, friendly hotel in financial district - my go to!
text: This is my "GO TO" hotel when I visit NYC.  The rooms are clean, the location is great (close to subway stops) and across the street from Battery Park.  The staff is always excellent.  Big shout to WANDA - she went above and beyond for me with helping with directions, check in, and was so courteous every step of the way.  Love this place!  Thank you Wanda and crew.

title: Probably best Hilton property in NYC
text:
Stayed here a couple of times since opening.
No decline through pandemic.
Still well appointed, well maintained, well managed.
Reception staff very friendly and helpful.
Decent daily housekeeping as a matter of course.
Rooms are clean and big enough, fantastic view from 19th floor over the Staten Island ferry pier.  Even on the highest floor the window can be opened and it won't be too noisy. 
Excellent location for those, who don' t need Midtown's hustle and bustle. More shops and restaurants opened in the former very calm neighboorhood lately. 
Diamond status well appreciated. Breakfast double price of diamond credit.

title: We will stay somewhere else next time.
text:
I’m super confused about the stellar reviews of this hotel. It certainly does not merit the glowing descriptions so many first time reviewers have given.

PROS
1) Ladies at the front desk are nice. We requested housekeeping daily, and they only skipped us once.
2) Location was close to good subway stops that took us quickly to Brooklyn or uptown Manhattan. A surprisingly nice change of pace from Midtown.

CONS:
1) Room was not just “Manhattan small” but laid out weird. The closet was more of a cabinet where the ironing board/iron was also kept. But the ironing stuff ate up so much of the space that we couldn’t hang our clothes without twisting them to one side. Even after tossing the ironing board in a corner of the room, the iron holder jutted out and made retrieving our clothes difficult.
2) Condition of property was pretty dated and, in some ways, unclean. Carpets, for example, need to be replaced, especially in the halls.
3) Helipad across Water Street leads to constant drone of helicopters.
4) Not many great dining options nearby, although we understand that is a reflection of being in the financial district. 
5) We could hear everything— and I mean EVERYTHING — in the room next door, which leads me to…
6) Quality problem with some of the guests. The guy next door had an assortment of sketchy looking “friends” coming and going at all hours. I should have asked to move, but hoped it was a one night thing. No such luck. The door slamming, music, partying and female noises (yep!) led to two nights with no sleep.
7) Big stack of the “Epoch Times” newspapers in the lobby for the guests’ reading pleasure. Tells me everything I need to know about the owners.
8) No common space to hang other than the lobby. We stopped by the 2nd floor restaurant twice, and no one was ever there.

title: Très bon hôtel
text: Très bon Hotel, bien situé, personnel aux petits soins, nous avons vraiment apprécié de séjourner dans cet hôtel. Nous avons passé un agréable séjour et y retournerons sûrement lors d’un prochain voyage. Le matin, vous pouvez partir en emportant un gobelet de café gratuit.

title: Can not recommend this hotel enough
text: I had an absolutely fantastic stay at this hotel! The location was superb. The view of the water from my room was truly incredible, providing breathtaking vistas that made my mornings and evenings unforgettable. The staff at the front desk were the highlight - incredibly kind and welcoming, and always greeting me with a smile. Victor and Nakita and the rest of the team went above and beyond to make sure the room was comfortable, ensuring a restful stay. The room was spacious and the staff kept it clean and spotless everyday. I can't recommend this hotel enough!

title: The front desk team are amazing
text:
Stayed here for a few days for work. The rooms were clean and nice. Beds were very comfy. Pillows were great but the front desk staff were the best i have ever met.

They were friendly, funny, helpful and a joy to speak with. Great work ladies.

Location is great and good bars and restaurants close by

title: Thank you Latia
text: Latia was a wonderful host she made our stay at the Hilton flawless. Her attention to detail and dedication to ensuring our comfort made our experience truly exceptional. Without a doubt, I highly recommend Hilton Garden Inn if you are having a short stay near the financial center.

title: Great service
text: Excellent service and amenities. Latia was super helpful and friendly, getting me set up and figuring out my reservation after a long flight and late check in. I appreciate the help and the room was very pleasant.

title: Outstanding staff
text: We had an excellent time!!! The staff was great!!! Martin was very helpful with us, we left our luggage while we enjoyed New York. On our return to pick our luggage, Martin was very helpful, he gave us bottle water!!! I would definitely come back here!!!!

title: Another terrific stay!
text: Staying at the Hilton Garden Inn in New York's Financial District is always a lovely experience. The staff are helpful and generous, and we fully enjoyed our stay. Particular thanks go to Shantel, Rafael, and Jaquanna in Reception. They were always ready and willing to help with whatever we needed. See you again soon!

title: Great location! Great Staff!!
text: It was a great location for me for work! Good was great! Staff was amazing and accommodating!! Wanda and Martin made sure I had all the details on what was in the area. When I need to extend my stay, they made sure everything was taken care of! They were amazing!

title: Friendly and clean
text: friendly staff and easy check in! latia is super friendly and attentive! would recommend to anyone 10/10 place to stay! lobby is great clean. we did late check in at 12am and there was no problem. —jen

title: good service
text: Julie valerio is providing very good and warm service. I definitely recommend staying in New York for business or touring. it's close to the central park and a lot of famous land marks. and also very convenient.

title: BUENA UBICACIÓN
text:
Súper ubicado a pie muchas actividades también el ferry esta Justo enfrente y puedes llegar a los outlets empire a diferencia del Hilton garden inn de Times Square este nos gustó.
Súper cerca un parque creo que se llama Battery Park

title: Fantastic experience
text: The location was incredible, as there are many local amenities and tourist-friendly locations within walking distance. Staff were wonderful and in particular, Wanda at Reception was friendly and helpful. She shared her knowledge of the nearby shops, bars and restaurant.

title: sufficiente
text:
hotel un pò vecchio ma molto competitivo nei prezzi. Ottima posizione.
Colazione organizzata un pò male.
Camere spaziose, bel bagno, moquette da rifare, anche nei corridoi.
Front desk sufficiente. Servizio pulizia insomma, lampade sempre molto polverose.

title: 5 star experience
text: Excellent service. In front desk, Latia was an fabulous host. She was very kind and help us with everything we needed. The location of the hotel is perfect. Definitely coming back to NY and staying at this hotel.

title: Excelente alojamiento en NYC
text: Estuvo excelente, la ubicación 1A, la limpieza del hotel fue perfecta, las atenciones también, sin dudas volvería a seleccionarlo para mi viaje. Este hotel está muy bien comunicado por las paradas de tren. Puedes ir caminando al puerto. Es totalmente recomendado!

title: Great stay, appreciate the help from Latia
text:
That was an amazing stay, personally I want to thank Latia for help and being awesome manager ✌️
The personnel is very friendly, I like the rooms and 
the hotel itself is very clean 💯

Definitely will recommend to my friends next time!
Comparing to using other hotels this one falls into imy preference.

title: Convenient location!
text:
Highly recommend a high floor water view!! Despite another huge building across the street, blocking half the view, what we did see was stunning. 

Front check-in staff was great, very welcoming and cheery!

Great first floor lobby that we utilized to visit with family at the end of an evening. (No food lounge in the lobby though for coffee/tea/hot cocoa, but there is a 24 hour snack bar avail.) 

Negatives:
*The rooms themselves are very tight squeeze for a family of 3 (let alone, 4). 
*Our bathroom door was a sliding door that never closed all the way, and the bathroom doesn’t have a fan… so be prepared for no privacy there. 
*Our sink was not draining all the way, so I pulled out the drain stopper only to discover there was an inch of mold encasing the whole thing that only extreme hot water and my fingers could remove. :-(
* Upon entering the room, I noticed that we had a paper thin soap, 3 towels, 2 hand towels and no wash cloths. We were there for 2.5 days/2nights and needed washcloths and more soap. We went straight to the lobby to ask for these items and were promised they will be brought up while we were out. Upon our return, they were not there. Went to the lobby again, was told 15 min, still nothing. Desperately wanting a shower I called the desk 30 min later — I was told they were on their way and that they would call the room in 10 min to assure they arrived. Washcloths came but no soap. 10 min later soap arrived but no phone call to our room was placed. It just felt as though the assurances to us were empty and not regarded. 

Other than that, the man who checks luggage was kind. The location is SO convenient to so many things!!

title: Great Location
text: HILTON GARDEN INN NYC Financial Center was a great location for us!  Convenient for parking and access to Battery Park/Ferry to Ellis Island were 'must-haves' for us as we had to get to the ferry very early for a photography workshop.  We spent the early evening into the pm walking to the 911 Memorial and the Occulus so location, again, proved to be walkable and safe.  Accommodations were comfortable.  Our stay was made especially nice by Luigi and Nikita.  While they couldn't give us a very late check out, they were able to arrange for our baggage to be held while we were on an all-day photoshoot.  After a pleasant conversation with two front desk employees who were  happy to help and simply personable (They certainly represented the Hilton brand well), we retired for a 4:30 am wake-up and quick checkout the next morning.  Thank you!

title: Great Experience!
text:
I had an absolutely wonderful experience at the Hilton Garden Inn Financial Center in New York City, all thanks to Wanda! From the moment we arrived, she made us feel incredibly welcome. 

Wanda took the time to ensure we knew all the best places to go with kids in the area, making our family trip so much more enjoyable. 

I cannot recommend Hilton Garden Inn Financial Center enough and thank you, Wanda, for going above and beyond to make our visit to New York City truly outstanding!

title: Great stay with our baby!
text: This was our first trip with our 4 month old baby and the staff (specifically Wanda Mortin) were so lovely and accommodating to our needs. We were given a pack n’ play for our baby to sleep in and provided water bottles upon arrival. For the first day, we were gifted complimentary breakfast- which we chose the hot option (bacon, eggs and potatoes) over the cold buffet option. They also provide coffee every morning in the lobby which was great. My partner made use of their 24 hour gym as well! The hotel is beautifully located near the Staten Island ferry, the subway and many great eats in Wall St. The only area for improvement would be the drain in the shower which drained but very slowly. Otherwise, the hotel room was spacious, a comfy bed and pretty quiet for nyc! We would recommend to anyone travelling with kids or otherwise. :)

title: Incredible Staff
text: The views were great, but what really made this experience special was the staff. It seemed like a matter of culture, with every employee making you feel welcome each time you stepped through the door and always seeing if there was a way they could make your stay better. In particular, Luigi, Shantel, Victor, and Rafael stood out as proving exceptional service. I am not sure of their names, but housekeeping was happy to work with our schedule, and the gentlemen who helped us with our bags were very amicable as well.

title: Happy Hilton
text: Wonderful hotel near to the Staten Island ferry terminal. Although not in the midst of the Times Square area the subway was only across the road and the journey to Times Square was only 15-20 minutes. All the staff were courteous and attentive, you ordered your breakfast via a waiter and were served at your table fantastic. Our room faced the ferry terminal so we had a great view across the river. We booked this hotel as our initial hotel cancelled a week before we were due to arrive (St Patrick’s day), so glad we chose this particular hotel. There was nothing negative about anything, rooms and bed very comfortable, would definitely stay again when visiting NYC.

title: Would Stay Again
text: Stayed the weekend here and had an amazing experience. The hotel and the room was super clean and well kept. The staff was amazing as well and very friendly, especially Nakita and Luigi at the front desk, who made my stay all the better.

title: Idéal pour quelques jours à New-York.
text:
Hôtel idéalement situé à la pointe sud de Manhattan. Stations de métro  à 2 pas permettant de visiter New York très facilement.
Chambre spacieuse et propre avec vue sur la rivière, très agréable après une longue journée de visite.
Mention spéciale à Martin pour son accueil et ses précieux conseils durant notre séjour.

title: Wonderful
text:
It’s our first trip to New York. Apart from weather this weekend trip is wonderful. We stayed at Hilton Garden Inn NYC Financial Center/Manhattan Downtown during our trip. This location is perfect near to Statue of Liberty ferries. South ferry sub location is very near to this location and very good to travel to everywhere from here.

The hotel staff are so friendly and accommodating. Nakita, Victor, Jaquana are very good and provided whatever we need. We got a nice view room. They did room service every day. 
They have a restaurant as well for breakfast and lunch.

One flexible thing for honor members late checkout is available and they secured our luggage when we went out after checkout in their locker.

The area is so safe and happening place as well with restaurants near by.

Over all very good hotel to stay.

title: Great customer service
text: Excellent staff, greeted by Luigi at check-in, very helpful very friendly, great experience. Lovely hotel at a reasonable price for NYC,situated across the street from south ferry subway,34 dollars for 7 day unlimited metro card makes things lot easier. Upgraded by hotel to a nice view of the water,room european size,comfy bed. Not a fan of elevators but one's located in hotel very fast

title: What a great staff!
text: What a great hotel. The staff is so friendly and cheerful. Always go out of their way to help.  Special thanks to Martin, at the desk, and Steven in the restaurant. Both work extremely hard but they are never too busy to go that extra bit when you ask for something. We forgot some important documents, and Victor and Imran both made a special effort to get these to us. Can’t describe our relief and gratitude. Rooms are a bit tight, but it is New York. Don’t think you can beat the location. Near every train line. Also, a relatively calm oasis in New York. Thank you so much for a great stay. Just wish you were in charge of the weather too :).

title: Excellent helpful service &good restaurant
text: Staff was extraordinarily helpful and efficient. I had to stay an extra night because of bad weather and they made sure I kept the same room, and were very knowledgeable. Restaurant food surprisingly good, not expensive and served promptly. Thanks Mark, Wanda, Jaquanda!

title: Safe location and waterfront view
text:
I enjoyed stay . Waterfront view rooms were fascinating and still quiet enough for a good sleep :)

Rooms were very clean, pillows are comfortable - which doesn’t happen that often with me in hotels

Moreover, the personnel was astonishing! Special thanks to Wanda, Martin, Nakija - made our stay really pleasant. 

They were available whenever we needed them, helped with cards, suggestions, taxi to the airport, or just water whenever we needed some :) 
Indeed, this was my best stay in NYC ! 

Waterfront view truly stunning 
I highly recommend and suggest - think no more - you can’t go wrong with your stay in NYC with that hotel and fantastic crew that runs it 😍

title: WOW! I cannot recommend this hotel enough
text:
Time for a great story! 

I arrived at this hotel on a cold November evening after experiencing awful service at another hotel. This was a last minute booking as I was basically stranded in New York, first time solo travelling, first time in the US. 

I checked in and was asked how I am, when I briefly explained I was unhappy due to the service of a certain Marriott hotel nearby. 

I was greeted with smiles, nothing was too much effort and given a fantastic water view room! 

The hotel and room was spotless, the hotel lobby would later be decorated for the holidays which was great and…

… the FOOD! Absolutely fantastic. See photos. I paid for breakfast in advance on my booking - you had options of a buffet or made to order breakfast - catered very very well for vegetarians. 

I also had lunches / dinners at the hotel which I paid for ad-hoc. Each meal was exquisite. The taste, the presentation, the service.

Thank you so much for your great hospitality - you really did make my trip to the US and New York great and one to remember - literally getting goosebumps while I type this. Also great location, close to Statue of Liberty boat that takes you there, staten island ferry and the subway which can take you everywhere easily.

Sorry I don’t remember anyone’s name as it’s been a while now, but thank you for your great hospitality at reception and the restaurant. 

You made me feel comfortable, at ease and above all HAPPY! Thank you!

title: Great service
text:
Mark, Imyan, Luigi, Rafael, Jaquan’s, and others were great and very accommodating. 
My story: called 800 number to adjust one of my nights as I was coming to my at a very busy time for business and then heading off to Marrakesh for earthquake related relief. The 800 Hilton customer service rep canceled my entire reservation when I told her not to and that left me with 1200 per night plus prices for my trip that was the next day… after hours of attempting to fix the situation I was left to show up with no other options at hand. The desk helped me out and although I ended up paying almost 1000 for the first night the remainder of the stay was adjusted so it wasn’t as terrible. They cared , and should be recognized. Hilton customer service should be ashamed with their call centers. Over all of my years I have not seen it so bad.

title: Excellent Hotel ..
text: An excellent stay thank you. Great welcome and assistance with bags and room/bathroom were spotless. Coffee machine and microwave on oven were great amenities and it is just a short walk from Stock Exchange/The Bill and Staten Island Ferry. I walked to Trade Centre Memorial in just 15 minutes so the hotel is very well situated. A very good stay and highly recommended ..

title: Hilton should do better…
text: This Hilton clean and comfortable, location was good. However, we did not receive the rooms we requested. No compensation was offered until we asked for comped breakfast. The breakfast was disappointing.

title: Excellent stay, nice staff, Thanks to Martin!
text: Very good stay and very nice staff. Big compliments to Martin from the reception - he helped a lot and super friendly employee. Good located, nice atmosphere - clear recommendation. Free coffee in the morning quite nice.

title: Ottimo albergo
text: Stanze  pulite, perfettamente funzionante, abbiamo avuto due problemi uno con la cassetta di sicurezza e l’altro con il forno a microonde, prontamente risolto dal personale, solo Wanda alla reception non molto simpatica, scostante, struttura vicino ai mezzi pubblici. Il dipendente “Martin Jaquanna eccezionale gentile e premuroso.”

title: Warm and welcoming
text: The hotel is very comfortable and the staff (Wanda ✨✨✨✨✨) are very welcoming and helpful, in many ways. First I lost a jacket and they found it and kept it for me, then they helped me when I needed it in many other ways. They are also very understanding of me even when I cannot communicate properly because english is not my first language. I am very very very grateful for everything and I recommend Hilton Garden very much.

title: Great trip
text: The room is clean and water view room is excellent. Staff are very kind and cooperative specifically Nakita and Wanda. Location is great. Some bath room needs maintenence but service response is very fast . The romm size is big compared with others in the city.

title: Perfect in every aspect
text: Best hotel experience I have had in NYC, the room was clean and very well equipped, great views. And the best part was the reception service. Wanda and Makita and all the team were extremely nice and professional. The hotel is also perfectly located, 15 min walk from anything in downtown NY. I definitely recomend the stay at this hotel

title: Convenient stay at Lower Manhatten
text: Great hotel well located with eateries close by. Convenient to Statue of Liberty, 9/11 Museum, the Bull on Wall Street etc. It was close to Pier A where my sister started and finished her 20 Bridges Swim around Manhatten Island. The hotel had a safe, mini fridge and hair dryer, was well equipped. Only complaint I have is my son was charged $3 when he asked for a bottle of water from reception. It should have been provided for free. I wasn't charged when I asked for a bottle so I can't figure out why the difference in treatment.

title: Recomendo Hotel Muito bom
text: Hotel limpo, ao lado do metro, ao lado do Batery park, com balsa para estatua da liberdade, quarto amplo, com cafeteira e frigobar, staff atencioso principalmente o Martins, que nos ajudou muito, não utilizamos o cafe da manhã, porem havia pago a parte.

title: Helpful Staff
text: Sink was clogged, told the front desk and it was fixed when I got to my room later that afternoon. Upon my departure, I wanted to make sure I was taking to correct train/bus to get to LaGuardia Aiport since I got lost on the way to the hotel. Martin was very helpful in making sure I was taking the easiest route so I didn’t miss a train stop again. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Amazing experience!
text:
The staff, Mark,  Shantel, Martin from the front desk were amazing.  Professional, informative, and invested on insuring we had the best time. They provided suggestions, and greeted us and every one with a smile and pleasantly. We felt like friends and family. 
Johana from the dinning area was pleasant, friendly, professional and even thought she was busy she had  a smile. 
Overall an amazing experience.

title: Super el servicio
text: El personal muy amable, me ayudaron con todo, Martín es una gran persona y siempre a ayudaba en todo, hasta para tomar el taxi de regreso. El hotel estuvo muy bueno. Yo me equivoque en la reserva de habitación y Wanda me ayudó con la solución de la habitación

title: Good location for lower Manhattan
text:
Close to several restaurant/bars (Fraunces Tavern and Dead Rabbit are close), waterfront park, Brooklyn Bridge.  Water view room had more of the neighboring buildings in the view than water, so pick the higher level rooms for views of the city (and they are lovely at night).  
Rooms are small, but comfortable.

Hotel staff polite and welcoming, parking garage 1 block away.  Stayed while on business at Barclay's Center.

title: Wonderful Staff and perfect hotel
text: Hotel is really clean, staff is amazing and rooms are great. Martin, front desk guy, was super helpful and always smiling. Same as Wanda and all the other people at front desk. The location is great, in front of a subway station, with small grocery shops around and the inside of the hotel is great too. I also really liked the fact that there was a small fridge in the room, microwave oven and coffee maker. It was for sure beyond my expectations for a Manhattan hotel in NYC.

title: Great Hotel at a Great Location!
text:
Check in process was smooth. We loved the digital key feature of the Hilton honors app. Rooms were clean with a city view. The room had coffee maker, safe, microwave, mini refrigerator, and an iron box. In the beginning we had some issues with the air conditioning unit. However, the house keeping staff was friendly and they resolved the issue within 10 minutes. 

We also wanted to mention Nakita and Wanda at the front desk for having clarified our questions as well as having provided us with tips to navigate around NYC and being friendly too! You guys are wonderful! Also worth mentioning was their complimentary tea and coffee. 

Getting to times square was easy via the subway reaching within 25 minutes. The staaten island ferry terminal is just across the street. We shall definitely recommend this hotel!

title: Great service!
text: Comfortable bed.  Clean.  Great location to Statue Cruise and Subway.   All the staff was so helpful and wonderful.  Wanda checked us in and took care of us our whole stay.  Another gentleman (you know who you are) patiently taught us how to use the subway.  He told us just how to go.  Thank you Hilton staff!!!!

title: High quality hotel for exploring Manhatten
text:
An absolute treat of a hotel, outstanding staff who can't do enough for you and really nice (fully air conditioned) rooms. Their restaurant is brilliant and overlooks the Staten Island Ferry, reasonably priced (for an NYC restaurant) and a great selection of drinks. The hotel was kept to a very high level, clean and modernised throughout.

In addition this is very well placed, 2 mins walk from Staten Island Ferry, 5 mins walk from Wall Street, 15 mins walk from the World Trade Center memorial and within 20 mins subway ride to Central Park, Empire State Building & Broadway.

The entire staff were nice, Martin in particular helped us with sorting out our taxi back to the airport the day before we left and advised us on timings and cost to make sure we got it right.

title: Merci au personnel
text: L’hôtel est super bien situé, le quartier est calme et safe. Il y a 2 stations de métro à côté qui vous emmènent au cœur de Times Square. Le personnel est poli est très gentil envers tous types de demandes. Martin, le valet nous a beaucoup aidé ! Merci !

title: Great location and deal
text: Luigi, Martin, and Wanda took good care of us at check-in. They are a very efficient and friendly team. We made a last minute (day-of) reservation to stay here and had a very pleasant stay. The room was clean and pretty big for the price and location. Also a sweet view from the 16th floor.

title: Great place to stay
text: I cant say enough how pleasant, accomodating and welcoming the night shift at this property was to us. Wanda Hernandez, Luigi and Martin greeted each individual w professionalism. It was a busy night at the front desk. Sunday, so many checking in and all I can say is Hilton your soooo lucky to have a team like them. Will come back because of them.

title: Schönes Hotel im Herzen New-Yorks
text:
Das Hotelzimmer ist top!
Wir hatten das Zimmer für drei Tage gebucht. Beim Check in wurde uns durch das freundliche Personal (Wanda, Victor, Martin) ein kostenloses Zimmerupgrade angeboten. 
Die Aussicht ist beeindruckend!

title: Front Desk Agent, Martin.
text: We’ve stayed here two years in a row for university move in; both times we were delightfully welcomed by the front desk agent, Martin, who has gone above and beyond to make our stay a great experience. Not only has he remembered us a whole year later, but he has made it his personal duty's to accommodate us with anything we need, including but not limited to personally helping us with our bags to our room, offering directions and helping us navigate public transit, offering wonderful suggestions for things to do, and making sure our shipped packages were well taken care of. While every staff member we’ve encountered on our trip here have been wonderful, we find Martin to play a significant role in our decision to return. Can’t wait to come again next year.

title: Great service from Luigi and Nakita
text:
We had to best time staying at the Hilton Garden Inn. Every need was taken care of within a quick and easy time. Would recommend staying at this hotel to all my friends and family. 

Special mention to both Luigi and Nakita on the front desk. There service was 10/10

title: Great Staff - Top Stars to Wanda!!!
text: Just stayed there on a business trip and every day I had multiple questions about transportation and other issues which the staff were eager to reply. Wanda at the front desk was very gracious and helpful with my son who arrived for the weekend and who is autistic. Will definitely come back.

title: Good price per value stay in Manhattan
text:
Room is not huge - it’s Manhattan - but new and well organized. Same comment on the bathroom.

Breakfast is available, buffet is not wide but there is a good list of dishes that you can book.

Staff is very friendly!

Price for value is pretty good for a new hotel in Manhattan.

title: Always a good stay despite constant digital key issues
text:
==== UPDATED REVIEW FOR AUGUST 2023 ====

Second time staying here in the last three months.

I want to start off by saying I am very disappointed that based on another review I just read, the person at the front desk lied to me about the digital key option not working.

Truth be, digital key has not worked for me at this location or the one I just stayed in Fishkill NY over the past weeks and months.  I have complained relentlessly about this feature being made available but somehow never works.

So, I asked the woman at the front desk why my digital key did not work.  She blamed it on a possible problem with my credit card not authorizing.  That's BS as I know my credit card information was entered correctly and that it's valid.

Turns out, according to another review, the digital key access has been down (or will be down) for 6 months.  I suppose this is something that Hilton doesn't want to tell its customers.

Despite being lied to at the front desk we do appreciate being personally called when a room became available.  The staff at the front counter was very good at holding our bags both at arrival and departure day.  Thank you for that.

Original review from 3 months ago below...

I always try to stay with Hilton Inns as I find them to be an exceptional value for the money.  Was a bit disappointed that their Hampton Inn, next door, was booked for our Great Saunter weekend as it would have included free breakfast at such an expensive price point.  The Hilton Garden Inn does not offer free breakfast though a restaurant is located on its second floor.

This is an excellent hotel at an excellent location with a good variety of restaurants nearby.  The front desk personnel were extremely polite and welcoming.  We got some great tips on where to go for dinner.

The downsides?  The Keurig machine is broken in room 1402. Forgot to report it, but I am sure after the staff reads this review, they will replace it.  There's still water inside it as it never dispensed it for our coffee.

Also, very disappointed in the Digital Key concept.  It's supposed to allow you to skip the front desk and go right to your room at check-in.  However, I have yet to stay at a Hilton hotel that offers this service and not had the app mandate me to check in at the front desk.  Why advertise the convenience of this service and it doesn't work as promised?

Still, despite those issues, I still give this hotel my highest recommendation as the rooms were extremely clean and we enjoyed a good night's rest.

Be aware the hotel will mandate a $100 deposit at the time of check-in that will be refunded when you check out.

title: gutes Preis Leistungsverhältnis, super Lage
text:
2 verschiedenen Kissen zur Auswahl 
Gemütliche Betten 
Sehe sauber Zimmer 
Kostenloser Kaffe am Morgen 
Freundliches Personal  (Martin, Marz, Sanante, Thank you so much )
Ruhige und sichere Lage 
Direkte Metro Station in Laufnähe, gute Anbindung an viele Attraktionen

title: Great hotel and staff
text: The front desk staff were so helpful. Always smiling. The rooms were clean. The subway is right across the street. Easy access to New York. Had a great view of the river. Location was walking distance to battery park and the financial district.

title: Pleasant stay in NYC
text:
We had a very pleasant stay in this hotel. The location is very good.
Service was excellent and Mr. Martin from the reception desk was especially kind and helpful with a lot of information about what to do in the area.

title: The BEST hotel in Fidi
text: I knew as soon as we entered that this hotel was going to be wonderful. It smelled delicious and the staff was so welcoming and nice. Wanda and Luigi, at the front desk, went out of their way to make sure our stay was exceptional. The room is clean, spacious and just great! I will stay here again and I will recommend it to my friends!! In addition to the amazing staff, the hotel is located so close to Whitehall Terminal (Stanton island Ferry), Seaport, One World Trade Center, China Town, Little Italy and so much more!! I love this area and the staff here has made me believe that the Hilton Garden Inn is THE place ti stay in  Fidi!!

title: A very nice place to stay in Manhattan
text:
The hotel is 1-5 min walking from several subway stations that will send you in no more than 20-30min to some of the main attractions of NYC (Times Sq, Circle Line Cruises, Intrepid, Central Park, Rockefeller Center, Empire State, Chinatown...). It is also at 5-15min walking from other downtown attractions like Wall Street, WTC, 11S Museum, Statue of Liberty and Staten Island ferries. To sum up: great location to visit Manhattan 

The rooms are clean and nice, but not expect them to be very big (since we used the room just for sleeping, for us the size was just fine). They include refrigerator, microwave and a coffee machine, great plus for us since we had breakfast  in the room to save time. 

The hotel offers complimentary coffee and milk in the morning, another huge plus for people expecting to have breakfast inside their room or to have it on the go. 

Finally I would like to give thanks to Wanda, who was in the reception desk during our stay and helped us a lot with any trouble we had in the hotel and solved any question we had about NYC. Thanks to you our stay were much more pleasant!

title: Great place in t'he financial district
text: Luigi, Wanda and Víctor have been very helpful in calling a taxi for us and many other questions we had about the City. We liked the stay very much. Bed ist confortable and the shower was convenient.

title: Spend the extra $100 and stay somewhere else.
text: Worst hotel stay. Only 1 of 3 elevators worked, and it took upwards of 15 mins to arrive. The AC in our room never got above 75 degrees on a hot August night. We called the front desk and was assured “The Engineer was on his way up.” And he never arrived. The beds were terribly lumpy and the pillows were useless. We ended up going home earlier than intended because we were so exhausted from the lack of sleep. Clearly hotel staff is aware of all the issues, but choose to ignore them.

title: Peace of mind
text:
Wanda, Luigi, Victor and Vanessa all gave stellar service! They made a business trip fun and comfortable. 

They provided quick checkin, great service at the restaurant. I highly recommend this nice hotel.

title: Luigi
text: Luigi made the overall experience welcoming, great customer service and accommodations .  Will stay here again- clean nice room in the heart of the financial center . Thanks for making my stay comfortable

title: Clean, Friendly Staff, and Nice Location
text: Overall was a great stay! Mark at the front desk was incredibly helpful and attentive. The  hotel as well as the room was clean. It was also close to ferry stations and multiple subway lines. I would absolutely stay here again.

title: Wonderful customer service at the Hilton Garden Inn NYC
text: Luigi and Wanda were so extremely helpful and friendly.  They helped arrange our ride service to the airport.  With that said,  their excellent customer service gave us peace of mind.  For me, caring and thoughtful customer service is so important.  And that is what we experienced at the Hilton Garden Inn NYC on Water St.

title: Top notch customer service
text: This is the best hotel in the financial district. The entire staff is amazing but want to shout out personally Shantel Wanda Ann and Luigi. They are the most sweetest group of staff you could ever meet.

title: Excellent
text: Very clean and friendly.  Felt secure in hotel and with parking nearby.  They were very helpful with food suggestions.  We were able to walk to make sites and the subway was across the street.  We had great views from our window.

title: Nakita was amazing
text: 5 stars ⭐️ for nakita she was great to the customer and made them feel at home she also did her job very well theb most people at work do she made the stay very nice we enjoyed the trip we will come again

title: NAKITA IS GREAT!
text: 5 Stars ⭐️ for Nakita! She has great customer service! Excellent worker. She was pleasant and made our stay nice. We really enjoyed our trip here. And looking forward to more trips in NYC! The hotel was nice and clean.

title: Un hotel de 10
text: Nuestra estancia fue maravillosa en el bajo Manhattan. En recepción, Martín, Snontel yJaquema fueron muy amigables y nos ayudaron a descubrir la ciudad y a movernos de forma efectiva. Es muy agradable recibir ayuda. Muchas gracias amigos. Volveremos!

title: Best hotel experience in NYC
text:
Had an amazing experience at this hotel, the staff was so very welcoming and warm. Felt safe and comfortable in our room as well. Martin Niquita was one of the managers at the front desk, he was very helpful and over all a nice guy, if you ever stay at this hotel and are looking for any guidance or advice on the best spots in New York look for Martin! 

We will definitely be staying here again when we come back to NYC! 
Cheers!

title: Kudos to Luigi
text: I lived here for 4 nights. The front desk is really welcome and helpful. I needed to print several files but couldn’t connect to the printer, Luigi helped me out really well. The hotel per se is alright, rooms have what you want, one minor is the construction outside but acceptable.

title: Economical price for a good Hotel which was neat and clean, friendly staff and good location
text:
The room was neat and clean. Closet space was a bit small but was ok for us.
The location is very good as its close to the ferry terminal and the underground tube and local busses. The freedom tower and charging bull were just walking distance, so overall very good location.
Staff were very friendly and helpful. 
Ms. Rosanna was also very helpful in getting us all information to take a ferry to get across to NJ.
Specially thanks to staff at the front desk Mr. Martin went out of the way to assist us in getting a cab to the airport which was cheaper than Uber and the local cab. He got us a Toyota senator ..big SUV very clean and comfortable. All our luggage was able to fit in easily as we had 2 large heavy suitcases besides our carry on luggage. The driver Jaico was a very polite and friendly guy and helped us with both unloading and loading our luggage without expecting any tip. However we did tip him for his generosity and kindness.
Would definitely recommend this hotel to stay in.

title: EXCELENTE
text: Un excelente servicio! Los cuartos limpios y ordenados. En la recepción te entienden muy bien, especialmente Martin y Luigi, si hablan español, ellos los pueden ayudar. Tiene una excelente ubicación en el sur de Manhattan.

title: Situation géographique intéressante, hôtel un peu triste et sans grand luxe...
text:
Très bien placé en matière de transports.
Peu de restaurants alentour
Le lobby et la  réception sont assez tristes et banals
Chambres assez agréables avec café, vue sur l'eau et lits confortables 
Pas de bar accueillant 
Petits déjeuners corrects mais sans plus : salle de restaurant sans intérêt, choix entre un buffet (assez limité) ou un plat à la carte (sans buffet!)

title: Nice hotel with good location
text:
+ Nice hotel with good location. 
+Peaceful and safe area. 
+Friendly staff.
+Comfortable bed and pillows. 
+Clean room.

- Not the best view from our room (we could only see other building from our window.)
-Not the greatest soundproofing in our room. We could hear noises from the streets. 
- Breakfast was not included in the price.

title: A pleasant, enjoyable, relaxing and educational experience.
text: My husband & I are from Texas visiting New York for the first time.  Wanda was absolutely wonderful and helped us out tremendously.  She was so patient and kind helping us out with where to go as far as attractions and navigating transportation.  Luigi was very helpful and assisted as well.  When we come back, Hilton Garden Inn NYC Financial Center will certainly be where we will stay.  Hopefully Wanda and Luigi will still be there to help us.  Their customer service was 5 stars!

title: Good hotel in good location
text: Luigi at the front desk is phenomenal! We had an overall good stay, the hotel is in a great location close to restaurants bar and ferries.the governors island ferry and the Staten Island ferry is a round the corner. Great access for day trips.

title: Thank you Mark and Martin!!!
text:
Great hotel. Great location. Big THANK YOU to MARK DACRES Guest Service Manager, made our stay the best. Gave us the best room during out second visit on our way back from New York. Also THANK YOU to MARTIN for his help, kindness and patience. 

Nabil Alami

title: Friendly and courteous staff
text: Every staff member we encountered at the Hilton garden inn were delightful! Luigi definitely was helpful and engaging. He accommodated us with our situation. But all staff attendants were wonderful from the breakfast staff to the happy hour staff to the lobby staff. Our rooms were also well taken cared of. This is our second stay at this hotel and it is very conveniently located.

title: Weekend Stay at Hilton!
text: Luigi was a great concierge! He was very helpful and gave great insight on where to park and how breakfast/the bar works. For an out of towner (and veteran) like myself,  his customer service and exceptional professionalism made my trip to NY a fulfilling experience! He is exactly what Hilton should aim to scale their talent around as far as new hires. He’s got it! Hilton is the way to go, and this location specifically has great staff like Luigi so definitely add it to your itinerary!

title: Great Customer Service
text: Nakita, Shantel, Luigi and Victor are absolutely the most fabulous front desk squad. They are so kind, professional and go above and beyond with every guest interaction. Sitting in the lobby at times, I had the opportunity to observe how each interacts with guests. I’ve stayed at a lot of hotels in my life and the staff here is just the best! This hotel is always my first choice if I’m staying in Manhattan. I’ve stayed here a handful of times for work for the last 18 months. The hotel is always clean, updated, and offers fantastic service. It’s the hotel where you feel like you’re home.

title: HILTON GARDEN INN NY FINANCIAL CENTER
text:
The hotel was nice and well located. The staff, specially Martin at the Front Desk, was very helpful. 
The room with two double beds was very little for three persons.
The room was very clean.
The best aspect is the excellent location

title: Nice and convenient
text:
Hilton Garden Inn NYC Financial Center in Manhattan is very nice and convenient place to stay during your New York visit!
I want to give a credit to Luigi, who works at the reception and helped me very much with the registration process!
I’ll definitely come back here again.

title: Great experience!
text:
My trip to New York, were I stayed at the Hilton Garden Hotel was a great experience!
The registration process and payment process were pretty fast and easy thanks to kind reception worker Luigi!
A great view from my room satisfied me and my family a lot, I’m definitely going to pick this same hotel as the place to stay for my next NYC trip.

title: Wonderful experience
text: Wanda and  Luigi are the best! So thoughtful!!!! Helped us so much!!!! We loved the hotel! The staff was so helpful and made us feel at home!!! The hotel has very nice infrastructure, but what makes it exceptional is the staff that work here!

title: Hilton américain standard
text:
Hôtel bien placé dans l e sud de Manhattan 
belle vue pour chambres côté mer 
Chambre standard , petit  déjeuner standard , bruit du chantier voisin , bref un hôtel de nyc !
A noter bon accueil de Wanda

title: Great stay!
text: Book my room a couple weeks prior. Luigi, Victor and, An were very professional, and helped me when it came to the multiple questions I had. This is my second stay at this hotel. I would recommend to anyone who wants to visit NYC. Close to transportation and many restaurants.

title: Lovely Stay
text:
My boyfriend and I stayed here for our most recent trip 7/13-7/17. The hotel was clean, comfortable, and welcoming. The staff was always friendly and greeting us upon our arrival and anytime we were in the lobby. The room was clean and our view was amazing. While we booked through a third-party service, we received an amazing city view on the 21st floor. 

On the final night, we had points to redeem for a free night through my boyfriend's account, and we wanted to keep the same room as it would be a little nuisance to pack up everything and move for one night, so we inquired with Wanda, who immediately addressed our concerns, was extremely friendly and amicable while doing so. (We did end up getting to keep our room) and our experience was Wanda was delightful. The whole staff at the front desk was super helpful to any and all our requests. 

The one thing that I would say is the housekeeping lacked communication with the front desk, where one night we did wait over a couple hours to receive the new items we requested until we went down to the front desk to request them in person. The housekeeping closet also was empty more often than not. However, this was a minuscule issue that did not ruin our stay here. Definitely recommend!

title: Average
text: Overall average Garden Inn stay; outside of the amazing front desk staff(Wanda) it was completely uneventful. The ~$20 yogurt at breakfast was shocking to say the least. Shame that linen carts blocked the entrance for awhile as well. Would stay again if visiting the same customer for business but wouldn’t if traveling for pleasure.

title: Un muy buen hotel con excelente ubicación
text:
El hotel está ubicado en un sito agradable y alejado del ruido que caracteriza la zona media y norte de Manhattan.  Para mí la ubicación ideal, con estación del metro bastante cerca (a unos metros), lo que te permite desplazarte con bastante facilidad al usar este maravilloso medio de transporte.

Para cuatro (4) personas, la habitación nos quedó pequeña (son 22 m ²); por lo tanto, si tienes problemas con los espacios reducidos recomiento buscar otra opción de habitación, lo que podría incrementar el precio.

En una ocasión tuvimos problemas con la limpieza de la habitación, lo cual fue muy bien complensado por Luigi al ofrecernos desayunos, a propósito muy buenos siendo en EEUU, para la mitad de la estadía.  La primera mitad de la estadía también tuvimos desayunos como cortesía.

En algunos sitios de las zonas comunes (pasillos y ascensores) se observa que falta un poco de limpieza, pero nada que atormente tu estadía.

Para destacar, la atención de Nakita, Wanda y Luigi.  Excepcionales anfitriones.

title: Fantastic team
text: The hotel was a good hotel and everything was in order, clean and comfortable. The team were amazing, in particular Nikita at reception who was professional, friendly, upbeat and genuinely made a huge difference to how we felt about our stay. An incredible asset to the Hilton group :)

title: Poor staff behaviour
text: Even after previous notification, hotel staffs could not ensure proper check out. I am yet to receive my stay voucher or receipt.. Hotel staff promised me to provide receipt/voucher  with in 20 minutes after my check out as they could not provide me during checkt out but I am yet to receive that one.

title: Es la tercera vez que visitó este hotel en NY . Y regresaré  al mismo por todo lo antes mencionado
text:
Viajamos a NY en familia estuvimos hospedados del 6 al 14 de julio 2023. La habitación 2006. La ubicación del hotel es excelente para conocer NY . Las habitaciones impecables, el personal de limpieza, de recepción del restaurante y en general son personas muy agradables, educadas y atentas . Los alimentos son buenos .Considero una mención especial a las siguientes personas que hicieron mi estancia más Plácida : en recepción Wanda, Lugi, Mavita o Makita, Martin y Johana en el restaurante.
Gracias por todas sus atenciones

title: Details that makes the difference
text: Fabulous attention, Luigi and Martin made me feel welcome and at home after a whole day of walking around NYC. I loved the personal attention, we arrived in the morning and they took care of our luggage until check in time, and when we came back, the reception was friendly and warm. title: So good

title: Awesome location and hotel
text: Great breakfast and great service, especially Wanda and Victor! Room was clean and comfortable and the location was unbeatable.  Right across from Staten Island Ferry, easy walk to ferry or Subway to go anywhere in Manhattan

title: Brilliant bargain option
text:
We were looking for a well appointed hotel in Manhattan at a reasonable price and this certainly ticked the boxes. You could see the System Island Ferry terminal from the hotel, the Statue of Liberty cruises were a few minutes’ walk away and there were numerous subway lines in easy walking distance (1, 5, R & W).  The price was one of the cheaper options in Manhattan yet the rooms were spacious, clean and in good condition.  All staff seemed very friendly and our room was cleaned daily to a good standard.

I have only rated the hotel as a 3/5 for the following reasons:
-  Only one member of staff on at busy times which led to queues checking in etc.
-  Paper / plastic cups only in the room and coffee only to drink (I knew this and had bought a travel kettle and my own tea bags)
-  Room key card didn’t work on the first attempt and we were on 23rd floor so this was a long journey back down! This happened to a number of people so not a one off
-  The cleaners sometimes forgot to replace all towels, leave fresh cups and more coffee or soap which would then lead to another trip back down to reception to stand in line, which got boring quickly! I still have no idea why our soap was replaced daily (this seemed wasteful)
-  Only one small wardrobe (with just 4 hangers) and no proper drawers to store clothes

Unexpected plus points:
-  Iron and ironing board in room
-  Good sized room
-  Very effective air conditioning and a window that opened enough for fresh air
-  Lots of USB charging points in the room
-  Free and fast Wi-Fi
-  Mini fridge and microwave in the room

title: Great customer service
text: We had a great stay!  The accommodations were excellent.  What made the stay so nice was the attentive staff, especially Wanda and Natkita. Thank you for your attention to detail and outstanding customer service!

title: Highly Recommend
text: Nice clean hotel in the heart of the financial district.  Check in was smooth and easy and Wanda was extremely helpful.  I would strongly recommend. to anyone looking for a clean hotel with good basic amenities.

title: NYC trip in June 2023
text: I had a great stay at the Hilton Garden Inn/Financial Center.  I came to NYC for pleasure.  The area was quiet and felt nice and safe.  Nakita Moore was working the front desk at my check-in.  She was very professional and knowledgeable about the area.   You may want to have maintenance check out the elevators; they were slow.

title: Hotel perfecto para tu estancia en NYC
text: Estuvimos muy agusto en el hotel, tanto por la ubicación, instalaciones y por el trato del personal. Desde nuestra llegada, que nos recibió Wanda, hasta nuestra salida, que nos despidió Luigi, fueron muy atentos y serviciales. Sin duda un hotel para recomendar en un lugar tranquilo fuera del bullicio del centro de Manhattan.

title: Great experience in NY!
text: We want to thank the staff from the Hilton Garden inn NYC in the financial center, Luigi, Nakita Latia, Ann, Victor, for being so helpful in our stay. title: Great customer service from Nakita!

title: Will be returning

text:

 I will be back.

text:

We had a great stay and would love to stay here again in the future!

title: Weekend in NYC
text: We can see the Staten Island Ferry from our room! Cold a/c, friendly staff, comfortable bed, and clean. Restaurant on the 2nd floor served great breakfast and dinner. Thank you Luigi, An, and Martin for a great stay!

title: Clean, Friendly Staff, and Reasonably Priced
text:
Rooms are clean and hotel is conveniently located near subways to midtown, Battery Park, and the Staten Island Ferry (check out the Taiwanese boba tea and ice cream shop near the ferry terminal in Staten Island, the desserts are to die for!). Staff was very kind and provided free breakfast vouchers for me and my family. Limited free street parking is available around the corner on weekends, which was a nice bonus. Also got a really good deal through Priceline.

Negatives are that rooms are small (but what do you expect for NYC?) and there was construction going on out front.

title: Shantel & Luigi welcomed us with smiles and information. They remembered us each time we passed by and offered help.
text: Shantel & Luigi and all front desk staff are excellent. Room was comfortable and had everything we needed. Great location. Free breakfast was a nice bonus. We would definitely stay here again. Enjoyed their recommendations for lunch. 😀😀😀

title: Perfect stay with perfect view
text: The convenience of checking in with Nakita Wanda was absolute ease, and the room we got had a top view between the concerte jungle of NYC. The accessibility to the metro is very good. Housekeeping was perfect with their cleansing of room. Would definitely recommend staying here

title: Service with a smile
text: The front desk staff at our check-in, Nakita, Wanda, and Luigi, were stellar. So friendly, helpful, and genuinely kind. After several hours of travel, their cheerful demeanor really brightened our day. The hotel is clean and well-appointed, and we had a lovely view of the Hudson. It's also well situated within walking distance of several well-rate restaurants and coffee shops. Also, when we had a minor issue with our shower door, it was rapidly fixed with one phone call. I would highly recommend it.

title: Overall decent stay

title: Ariel Brandon

title: Wanda was great!!

Literally 1 min walk to the Staten Island Ferry. Also very nice 787 Coffee around the corner!

When we arrived at reception, Luigi was still working his shift and he sorted everything out for us, including a room upgrade, with some very kind help from his wonderful colleague An. The hotel itself is lovely considering it’s geared more towards business folk visiting the financial district but it’s the people that make it so special. Thank you so much Luigi and An!

title: Great experience in busy Manhattan
text:
Great service, amazing staff, anytime of the day. 
We enjoyed the gym and other amenities. Many subway stations around, easy to move around town. 

Special shoutout to Mark, Imran, Shantel, Mark and Nakita.

title: Incredible Stay!
text:
We had the most incredible stay at this beautiful property. We had about 8 people in our group and we all felt extremely well taken care of from arrival through departure. 
After a long travel day we were greeted and welcomed by Luigi for our check in process and he truly set the tone for our entire trip. He made us feel so welcomed, and provided us with exceptional service. He was always a smiling face and provided us with wonderful recommendations on food, sites, etc. We couldn't say enough good things about him!
In addition to the wonderful hospitality, The rooms were clean and the location of the hotel was very convenient for all of the activities our group wanted to do.
I highly recommend this hotel!

title: STAY HERE.
text:
I felt so cared for by Mark Dacres.  We had a reservation elsewhere that was disastrous and I walked over to the Hilton and Mark jumped right into action.  Incredible service, great room, and above-and-beyond attention to detail.

Shantel's service and kindness was icing on the cake.

title: Excellent Receptionist Service by Luigi
text: Upon entering the hotel, I was greeted and assisted by Luigi at the receptionist desk. Luigi was professional and courteous. The room selection had an amazing view.  Luigi was also extremely helpful in providing me with several restaurants choices in the area.  Luigi was amazing!

title: Great staff and clean rooms
text:
Convenient location, super nice and helpful staff. The room wasn’t too big but very clean and the housekeeper left the room in a well-organized, meticulously cleaned state every time. Coffee machine, microwave, fridge in the room. Breakfast was not included, but there was free coffee in the lobby in the mornings. Wi-Fi was rather terrible and the bed was too soft for me. Even though there were three elevators, it took forever sometimes to go up and down, given that the hotel is huge.
Overall absolutely recommended.

title: An is the best!
text: Staff is amazing! Ann is the best receptionist ever! I have been coming here for a year and she keeps me coming back with her ability to resolve issues and friendly service! The food is also great with great views.

title: True Hilton Teasure in NYC
text: Wonderful team-shout out for Nikita at check-in, and Steven for bar/dinner service-made this graduation trip go perfect after a mishap at competitor property. 6 days, all a pleasure! Easy to access all NYC has to offer!

title: Nice and pleasant stay
text:
We chose this hotel because we needed to be in the area. Not much to do around unless you walk a few blocks. The hotel is well mantained, clean, staff is polite and my room had everything needed even coffee. 
I had a nice stay and would recommend this place

title: Great customer service
text: Luigi provided great customer service and was very helpful during our stay. Overall good clean Hotel. Rooms were a bit small but great location and friendly staff. The fitness room was adequate. Parking was an issue as the hotel does not have parking.

title: A decent and quiet Manhattan stay
text:
Stayed there for my recent most business trip. It’s close to the water and relatively quiet. Also situated close to some decent eateries as well as the subway if you want to head uptown Manhattan. The rooms are reasonably spacious by NYC standards and also include an ironing board (a must for a business trip) a fridge, and a safe. This in addition to comfortable bed. 

I was provided with breakfast vouchers that entitle you to some decent breakfast options at their cafeteria. 

All in all, a pretty decent stay.

title: 9 of 10, Would stay again!
text:
Spent a week here on business, unexpectedly had to extend several days towards the end. I chose to stay here, even though it’s farther from my work site,  because of the excellent customer service. Wanda, Ann, Luigi were just a few of the friendly, service oriented folks I met here. Great staff, room was comfortable, everything worked. 

So why the 9? 

You guys have got to get that cheesecake back in the cafe! That’s it!

title: Great location
text:
Great hotel perfectly located  in front of the ferrys. Walking 
Distance to the World Trade Center and many other attractions. Ann and Wanda at the front desk are extremely helpful. Create place to stay with family, business or just to relax.

title: Great welcome and safe hotel
text: Luigi was absolutely phenomenal in welcoming us into the hotel!  We definitely felt the friendly presence and the hotel is located in a great location next to the financial district, water and Staten Island Ferry.  We enjoyed walking around New York City knowing we could come back to a safe home base.

title: Excellent service, comfy, clean rooms, great location
text:
I stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn/Financial District in May when I came to town to help my college student pack up his dorm room to move home for the summer. What a great spot, and what wonderful service! Wanda at the front desk was especially helpful, guiding me to the places I asked about and answering my detailed questions with a sincerely helpful spirit. Nakita was also friendly and helpful.  

The hotel is just steps away from the #1 train, which is a straight and easy shot straight uptown to everything you might want to get to when visiting NYC.  Rooms were clean, modern and comfortable. Breakfast is provided in the AM, which I haven't had yet, but I hear is fabulous. I would come here again.

title: Great central location for lower Manhattan
text:
For business downtown, or anywhere in the metro area, this location is superb!

Amenities are great, staff are friendly, and the cost is reasonable.

Trip Advisor tells me my review is too short, so there's that...

title: Amazing and friendly service
text:
We had such a pleasant experience here.
I had initially concerned booking a different hotel, but I’m so glad we didn’t.

Nikita checked us in and went over and beyond to make our stay pleasant.
She upgraded our room and also gave us complimentary breakfast for the 2 nights we were there.

Very great service.

Thank you Nikita!

title: Great service from Luigi and An
text: We had a wonderful trip and Luigi and An at the front desk were very helpful. Luigi is warm and has a great sense of humor, too. They both were professional and thoughtful. This hotel is the perfect location for exploring lower Manhattan and doing the Five Boroughs Bike ride.

title: Great Location and Friendly Staff!!!
text: Fantastic Location, good clean rooms, with an excellent breakfast.  The Staff was so welcoming, especially the front desk (Luigi and A.N.)- as they assisted us during our stay.  We will definitely stay here again due to the Staff, and the convenient location- as hotel is located less than a 5 min walk to the subway, Staten Island Ferry and Battery Park.  Convenient self-parking at the garage across the street.

title: Friendly staff and clean rooms
text: We booked last minute, and we were extremely happy with our stay. Luigi at the front desk was very accommodating and answered all our questions. He is the perfect person to have at the front desk with his welcoming smile. Our room had an amazing view of the water; it was spacious and clean. I have stayed in other hotels in the area, and this one has been the best so far.

title: Amazing customer service
text: Martin and crew were wonderful and made my experience very easy. We were able to check in early and leave at a reasonable time in the afternoon. We also were able to leave our suitcases here while we walked around.
