title: Excellent Hotel Choice Lower Manhattan
text:
I always try to stay with Hilton Inns as I find them to be an exceptional value for the money.  Was a bit disappointed that their Hampton Inn, next door, was booked for our Great Saunter weekend as it would have included free breakfast at such an expensive price point.  The Hilton Garden Inn does not offer free breakfast though a restaurant is located on its second floor.

This is an excellent hotel at an excellent location with a good variety of restaurants nearby.  The front desk personnel were extremely polite and welcoming.  We got some great tips on where to go for dinner.

The downsides?  The Keurig machine is broken in room 1402. Forgot to report it, but I am sure after the staff reads this review, they will replace it.  There's still water inside it as it never dispensed it for our coffee.

Also, very disappointed in the Digital Key concept.  It's supposed to allow you to skip the front desk and go right to your room at check-in.  However, I have yet to stay at a Hilton hotel that offers this service and not had the app mandate me to check in at the front desk.  Why advertise the convenience of this service and it doesn't work as promised?

Still, despite those issues, I still give this hotel my highest recommendation as the rooms were extremely clean and we enjoyed a good night's rest.

Be aware the hotel will mandate a $100 deposit at the time of check-in that will be refunded when you check out.

title: Great Stay at Hilton Garden Inn Financial Center NYC
text: I stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn Financial Center NYC this past weekend for the NYC 5-Boro Bike Tour.  The hotel was crowded with guests (and their bikes!) but the staff was helpful and professional throughout.  I requested a late check-out at the last second and Luigi and An made it happen without incident.  I would strongly recommend this hotel and their friendly and capable staff.

title: Heel aangenaam verblijf
text:
Hilton garden inn, in het Financial district is ideaal gelegen voor de stad te ontdekken. Dit hotel ligt vlak aan het water en aan verschillende metrolijnen. 
Het personeel was super vriendelijk! Nakita heeft ons bij aankomst onmiddellijk een upgrade van de kamer gegeven, met zicht op het water en de ferry's.
Op het einde van de dag kom je hier graag thuis om een rustige nachtrust te hebben. Zeer rustig en stil hotel.
Top aanrader.

title: Bar Restaurant
text:
Merci à Steven et Vanessa pour leur professionnalisme et leur gentillesse. 
Ils sont au restaurant et vous pouvez compter sur eux.
Tout le personnel de l'accueil est admirable.
Merci à eux pour leur gentillesse et disponibilité.
Ça fait du bien.

title: Cet hôtel est vraiment top !
text: Parfait, hôtel juste parfait ! Bel emplacement, personnel au top. Juste la wifi un peu moins top que la normale mais pour le reste c'est ok, c'est sûr, j'y reviendrai ! À NY c'est au Hilton Garden Inn que je viendrai !

title: Over rated
text: The A/C kept going out, ask the staff to move as the nights were hot. They rest the control panel 7 times, we finally  opened the window to cool off.   The staff is not helpful, they do not care about your comfort. The restaurant was just as bad, was told to sit anywhere,  then they don't come over.   Was there for a week and watched many people walk out as the staff did not try to help.   No parking,  construction stopping you from loading out front.   Carpet orders in the halls.  Just a rat trap.

title: Excelente ubicación, seguridad y atención
text:
Un lugar muy seguro y a pasos de las estaciones de metro Whitehall St, South Ferry y Bowling green. 

La recepción es amplia y el personal a cargo es muy amable, sobre todo Wanda quien supo que yo estaba de cumpleaños y nos regalo el desayuno por toda la estadía ❤️. 

Las habitaciones tienen un tamaño estándar, cómodo al igual que el baño. Podría decir que lo único “malo” era la puerta del baño ya que era corrediza por lo tanto no se sentía tanta privacidad, siendo algo incomodo. Tiene un pequeño closet pero uno suele guardar todo en la maleta por lo que no fue un problema. 
Cuenta con refrigerador, cafetera y microondas! Espectacular. 

En cuanto a los alrededores, estarán cerca de todas las atracciones famosas en Financial District. Muy cerca a unas 3 cuadras hay un lugar abierto 24hrs y también un T-mobile.

Consejo: pidan una habitación con vista al mar y lo mas arriba posible!

title: Great stay!
text:
Pros:
Bedding and bathroom were spotless. Location is great, just a couple blocks from several subway lines and the Staten Island Ferry. Front desk staff were so helpful and so lovely every time we needed help with something. Loved the free coffee in the lobby every morning.

Cons:
The floor in our room looked like it hadn't been cleaned in a while. There was an M&M left on the floor by whoever was in the room previously along with some other dust and debris so it seemed like no one had vacuumed the floor between guests. It wasn't a deal breaker since the rest of the room looked clean but I wish it had been cleaner.

Overall I would definitely stay here again!

title: April
text: Great hotel...great location....walk to bars/dining...multiple subway stations...Staten Island Ferry...and more!    But best thing about the hotel is the staff!  Everyone is cheerful, professional and helpful.  Shout out to Shantel, Martin, Nikita and An.

title: Staff goes over and above to help!
text:
On a  very rainy and windy weekend - the front desk staff (Luigi and Wanda) went over and above to make our stay wonderful. Wanda even went to her car and lent us her own umbrella(!!!) so we could stay dry on our walk to dinner. 
The cleaning staff were top notch too - rooms were perfect.  Thank you!

title: Excelente ciudad ! Deslumbrante
text:
Muy limpio muy prolijo y muy atento todo el personal del hotel 
Martín, Sauntel y Jaquanna como también los  empleados de la noche que todo el tiempo están atentos a los pedidos y consultas de lugares y direcciones

title: Súper recomendado!!
text: Encantada con la atencion o servicio al cliente de este hotel !!👏 Súper recomendado. Desde que llegamos de un viaje largo nos atendio en la recepción la srta. Wanda y Martin que nos dieron tips de la ciudad y atendieron de maravilla. La habitación tiene una vista hermosa y la ubicación es realmente perfecta,(al frente puede tomar los ferrys directamente) el restaurante está en el 2 piso y el desayuno más recomendando aún muy buena calidad y sabor sobretodo! Contenta con la elección. Recomendadisimo!

title: Nice hotel
text:
We came the first time to NYC and the hotel is very nicely located close to the MTA and the Wall Street. It is not that overcrowded as Uptown.

The service was excellent, especially the colleagues from the reception Martin, Snantel and Jaquanna were always very friendly.

Room service was done daily, maybe it could have been a little better since the bathroom was not that cleaned up, at least we were used to a different standard at Hilton in Europe especially with such price levels

All in all it was a pleasant stay and we would recommend this hotel

title: Nice stay
text: Our hotel room was very clean, bed was comfy and the view from our room was beautiful. Location of the hotel is great and there is two subway stations close by (South Ferry/Whitehall & Bowling Green). Also, the staff was extremely nice, especially Namika at the reception was so warm and welcoming.

title: 2 night stay with great service
text: The rooms were very clean and it was very easy to walk around battery park.  The team at the front desk were great.  Wanda was super friendly and very helpful.  She made our stay even better and we really appreciated the extra care for our experience.

title: Terrific stay in a great location
text: A wonderful stay. The staff were very congenial and helpful. Room was clean and comfortable, breakfast excellent. The reception desk staff were very thoughtful and engaging. Special thanks to Wanda in reception -- a real boon to the organization. I'll be back!

title: Very good experience
text: We had a really good experience at the Hilton Garden in nyc financial center. An and Wanda made everything possible to feel us welcome. Our room was very quiet, breakfast excellent with early start (6 am during the week which is great for people jet lagged coming from Eu who wake up early). Location is great with subway stations and ferry boat very close, helicopter tours starting also few hundred meters away. Wifi perfect throughout. The area is safe and quiet. Thanks again.

title: Great Place to Stay in Manhattan
text: Superb experience! The room is clean, quiet and the view is great. With same price, you can get a much bigger room and better facility than the hotels in Midtown. If you don't mind spending a little bit more time on the subway, this is a perfect place to stay in Manhattan. Receptionists are professional and friendly. Kudos to Victor, Nakita and Ann! Thank you guys for your help! We had a great time here.

title: MARIE JOHANNE KATTY
text:
Well situated Hotel in the financial district.
Warm welcome and quick check in. good service..Special thanks to Luigi and Nakita at the reception.
Hotel is clean. However found the room small and somewhat a bit expensive.

title: Excellent stay that brought me to new part of NYC
text: I booked my room at this hotel based on availability and, most important, affordability. I hadn't explored this part of NYC before and I assumed there wouldn't be a lot in the area. I was pleasantly surprised! The hotel is directly across from a beautiful park with a view of the Statue of Liberty. It's within close walking distance of the Trinity Church and NY Stock Exchange. Overall the neighborhood is much less frenetic than Midtown and it has a more historic feel in terms of street design and architecture. The hotel was clean and comfortable, and the room felt big compared to other NYC hotels. Service was impeccable and Martin was very helpful with information and assistance with our luggage. I had booked myself and my daughter in a King room, which was the cheapest option, and we were upgraded upon check in to two double beds, which was great. The hotel is very close to at least 3 different subway stations with direct connections to the different parts of the city we visited (Soho, Midtown, Times Square, Central Park). I would definitely stay here again.

title: Great place to stay with an awesome location.
text: Everything at the hotel was excellent. Location is near metro station and multiple sites to look at wall street. Metro station one block away. Service by the staff was great and the were really helpful at all times. Special thanks to Martin, Jaquanna and Imran for all the help.

title: Amazing experience
text: Upon registering we were meet by Wanda she was very helpful and such a pleasure to meet.  You need to have more like her at your front desk as we came in late stressed out and she made us feel so welcome

title: Awesome customer service
text: Check in was smooth and quick.  The room was very nice and clean with a wonderful view.  Wanda was very friendly and helpful.  I will be returning and recommending this hotel to all my friends and family.

title: Wonderful stay thanks to warm staff
text: We had a terrific experience checking and settling in, thanks to An at the front desk, who was extremely attentive to our two little ones. The room itself was somewhat compact but comfortable. The location was terrific. Highly recommend.

title: Nice visit to NYSE and Wall Street
text: I had a great stay and is a good location in financial district with Dead Rabbit, awesome restaurant and bar, next door.  Requested room service followed directions exactly and a special shout out to Nakita who was wonderful at the front desk and always had a smile.

title: A really Great Hotel!!
text:
This was my first time in New York in a very long time and the front desk agent Nakita set the tone for me. She was amazing! She exudes so much positivity and kindness, you can tell she really loves it here. She helped me with restaurants, an upgraded room, and hooked me up with breakfast with all smiles and jokes. The agents Victor and Luigi were great too! I will always come to and recommend this location when coming to New York!!!

It’s also very comfortable in the rooms and there’s a really good restaurant with great food on site! It’s convenient for traveling with the subway right across the street and a beautiful view of the water and lady liberty just a block away .

title: The hotel staff treated us very well.
text: The staff gave us very good service, recommending some good restaurants in the area and offering us one of the best double rooms. I would also like to thanks Martin, who helped us arranging a taxi lift to the airport, making our life easier when leaving New York.

title: Amazing family nyc vacay @ Hilton Garden Inn!
text: Had an amazing stay with the best front desk team and management for both night and day shift that was extra accommodating and did all the extra mile to make our stay relaxing w ith early check in and late check out and fun with the new recommendations the team shared with us - Shantel, Nikita and Jaquanna! They had the best energy and smiling faces to welcome guests! Will definitely come back! Amazing view, location and space for a vacation!

title: Great stay!
text: This was our second time at this property, and we really like the location a lot - it's right across from the Staten Ferry and subway lines, so it's super convenient. The front desk was very friendly and helpful, and the rooms are comfortable and quiet. We were upgraded to a water view, which was beautiful. The only issue for us was the elevator - there are three but usually only one was working, and it would get jam packed during certain times of the day, so you would have to wait for it to come back. Other than that, I would certainly stay again when in Manhattan.

title: Return to Battery Park
text: We have stayed here before when hiking the Great Saunter hike which begins at Battery Park. Based on a prior stay it was a natural choice to return. Our expectations were exceeded on every point. The standard was set by customer service agent Nikita who gave us such a gracious welcome. All the staff persons were positive and smiling. We enjoyed our stay immensely and will return next year. Thank you HGI Financial Center.

title: They got everything right
text: The service was excellent upon arrival with a quick check in. The room was very clean, the WiFi was good, the breakfast was great, and the location was very convenient for my work location and to other public transportation. I would stay here again.

title: Clean and freidly
text: Staff was great, Wanda & Ann were very friendly and helpful, would come back. Room is clean and modern, I highly recommend staying here. Convenient location of subway 1 and R lines  parking across the street

title: AMAZING staff!  Great Location!  Reasonable Rates!  Nice Rooms!  Highly Recommend the Water View!
text: My trip to the city with my son was for surgery at Memorial Sloane Kettering!  Wanda and Luigi, went above and beyond, to make the trip as comfortable and enjoyable as they possibly could!  The location is amazing!  Within walking distance to so many things. Including the 911 Memorial/Museum!   Food, Entertainment amazing views and Ferry’s to the Statue of Liberty!  and Ellis Island!  I highly recommend and will definitely stay again!!

title: Great location, great staff…
text: I arrived early and thank goodness the staff was quick to assist me; Nakita, An and victor were super friendly and provided a quick check-in. I had some questions about dining they were able to provide quick places to grab a bite. Very knowledgeable about the area.

title: Excellent customer service and very clean property
text:
Shoutout to Nakita and front desk manager, Mark, for their incredible customer service. They went out of their way to honor a day of booking rate from a third party site. The room sizes are quite comfortable compared to
other Midtown Hilton branded properties. Most importantly, very clean! Given their location to the subways, cleanliness, and top notch customer service, this is my Manhattan hotel of choice.

title: Our Stay at Manhattan
text: We stayed at the hotel with two kids. We had a great welcome by An and Wanda. Check-in was very smooth and during our stay, everyone was very helpful. The hotel is very well located and nearby the subway so everywhere is very much accesible from the hotel.

title: Excelente hotel
text: Ubicación excelente frente a staten island ferry, tres estaciones de metro a media cuadra,limpio, silencio absoluto en ks habitacion. Personal destacado por su atención: Johana en restaurante, wanda y Martin en recepción.un unico impase en el desayuno un dia q saliamos muy temprano a una excursión, subimos por yn café unicamente faltando 5 minutos para que abrieran y el señor que atiende ( es el único hombre no tengo el nombre)no nos permitió.el desayuno es de 7-10 am al subir a las 9:30 ya hay pocas cosas en el buffet y algunas como frita y queso crema no las reponen. El resto de los menud que se ordenan si

title: Great stay in great area
text:
Great stay in very nice hotel. 
We stood in this hotel in April 2023 for one week. The welcome in the hotel was very friendly - Wanda the lady at the front desk was so helpful and friendly. She gave great advices and visiting tips. The whole staff there was incredible friendly and helpful. Breakfast and cleaning team was also very nice :-) we will definitely be back in this hotel :-)

title: Hilton Garden Inn Financial District
text: A good place to stay…...clean, secure & staff were friendly & accommodating.   Martin Au helped us on our last afternoon when we had an early departure the next morning from La Guardia.  He arranged a vehicle to pick us up & deliver us to where we needed to be.   Other transportation availability in the area was convenient.

title: EXCELENTE HOTEL
text:
Excelente ubicacion. Cercania a cuatro estaciones de metro de diferentes lineas. Habitaciones confortables, buen aseo , silenciosas.
Lo mejor: atención del personal 
Inmejorable la Srta Wanda en recepción
Todo muy bien
Super recomendado

title: Great Location and amazing hotel
text:
The hotel was at a great location. 1-min walk from subway lines, 1 min away from the Staten Island ferry terminal!!! Superb service. Rooms were amazing! Beds super comfortable. We slept like babies! Our nyc trip turned out to be amazing because of this hotel and great great great service by An at the front desk. She was so understanding and helpful, espcially after hearing our horrible airbnb experience. She went above and beyond to make our stay special.
Special shout-out to victor as well.
Breakfast was the cherry on top!

title: Very nice
text:
The hotel is nice, clean, and in a great position. 
Room is not big but after all you’re in Manhattan. 
The personnel is very thoughtful, shout-out specifically An for a smooth check in and lots of great ideas for our stay. Thank you for your kindness and help!

title: Great room!!!
text: Pleasantly surprised by the view in the room. Room was clean and friendly staff. Special mention to An as she was helping with information I asked which was extremely helpful!!! Definitely recommend this place.

title: Great place to stay!
text: Great location in lower Manhattan, right by Staten Island Ferry, close walk to 911/WTC area and walking distance to Seaport area, Battery Park and Brooklyn bridge and close Subway access to midtown/upper Manhattan etc. Hotel was clean, we had excellent service to our room for cleaning. No issues with noise in the hotel. Great view from 28th floor! Front desk was helpful when we needed a few things like toothbrush, paper plates, bottled water. Very nice stay, definitely recommend!

title: Great service at a good price
text: I decided to spend Easter weekend in NY after a few days in the US on business and stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn Financial District. The room was surprisingly reasonable given the high demand at this time of year, and Luigi on the front desk was extremely helpful and courteous, helping me to settle in and figure out how to get the things I needed for my stay.

title: Nakita at the front desk was the very professional; this will be the hotel that I choose everytime.
text: Nakita was very professional and was the epitome of the type of service you want to receive when you stay at a hotel. It didn't matter the time of night she was willing to help me with whatever I needed. This hotel is great, and Thank you for making my experience even better Nakita.

title: Great location, great price, clean rooms.
text: Our family enjoyed staying here--the most important thing to us is cleanliness--the room was fresh, no mold in the bathroom, carpet was fresh. The fridge did have a little odor though. The room was a little tight but we had 2 queen beds and it's NYC so what can you expect! We were still comfortable and able to keep our open stroller in the room without any problems. The fitness center is good--basic but all you need to stay on track with your workout regimen.  We had breakfast at the restaurant-the food was okay. The staff An and Wanda were really helpful and kind to my kids and gave them a little toy which they were super excited about given that we didn't bring any toys.  The price was right, you can walk to subway, Staten island ferry, Battery Park-- ferries all in walking distance.  Oh and there's street parking on the weekend. We would definitely here again as long as the price stays right.

title: Excelente, El mejor Hotel
text: Pase el mejor aniversario con mi esposo, este hotel tiene el mejor servicio al cliente, desde el front desk con Martin y Wanda, desayuno delicioso y las alitas brutales, el personal de restaurante muy amable también. Ubicación esta justo al frente del State Island Ferry, por lo que tus mañanas van a ser mirando esa hermosa vista mientras desayunas. Muchas estaciones de tren cercanas también. Definitivamente si buscan un hotel que se sientan tranquilos con un servicio de primera este es el indicado.

title: Wonderful stay
text: The service was phenomenal. Ms. Wanda was amazing and very generous throughout our stay. Very kind and professional individual. She’s definitely an outstanding employee and makes the company looks good!

title: Non male
text: Hotel situato in una buona posizione per vedere new york con ingresso metro sotto l' albergo e si arriva in centro in meno di dieci minuti,viviane a piedi statua del toro praticamente dietro l hotel vicinanza ponti manattah e porto per prendere battelli per statua libertà, l unica cosa che la colazione era povera mancava sempre qualcosa e a parte la ragazza coi capelli rossi alla mattina era l unica sveglia capiva gli altri dormivano in piedi , poi un altra cosa che mi sento di dire che non parlando bene inglese alcune cose le scrivevo col traduttore e per informazioni chiedevo in reception e alcune di loro di mettevano a ridere come presa in giro  e allora guardandole male capivano che io capivo che ridevano do sta cosa .per il resto prendete piani alti per evitare di sentire casino

title: Goede ligging en schoon en netjes
text: Goed en netjes hotel! Kamer zeer schoon en netjes. Kregen van Martin - An en Niquita een kamer upgrade naar de bovenste verdieping heel erg leuk! Hadden daardoor mooi uitzicht op het water. Enige minpunt was het ontbijt. Duidelijk tekort aan personeel helaas, de 2 personeelsleden die er waren werkten heel erg hard maar konden toestroom niet echt aan. Verder is dit hotel een aanrader, het is ook zeer centraal gelegen bij de metro.

title: Lovely visit!
text: Thank you for a lovely visit! The room had everything we needed, and the location was convenient to the Hudson River and the subway. We so enjoyed our delicious breakfast every morning, and the coffee was perfect.  Thank you, “Wanda” for making us feel “at home” in New York City.

title: Clean, modern property with friendly staff. Great water view location in lower Manhattan’s financial district.
text: The staff is friendly and accommodating. We had an issue with our first room assignment being on a low floor where you could hear all of the construction noise. Wanda at the front desk was great! She quickly got us checked into a new room on a high floor and was professional and pleasant. We enjoyed our stay. Thank you!

title: Average dated hotel in quiet location - mostly European tourists stay there
text: Typical hotel of this chain. Could be any other chain, too. There's construction on the road which partly blocks the sidewalk, but it doesn't disturb much. The hotel's a lot quieter than midtown hotels since downtown is quieter itself, especially at night and on weekends. Location is convenient so South Ferry and subways. Hotels rooms are dated, simple, clean. Didn't have toiletries in the room, though, and no perks for HH status members. During my stay, the majority of other guests I noticed were European.

title: Great spot from which to explore NYC
text: Very nice hotel, the rooms were nice, clean and modern and the view was amazing. While this is already great the best part was the staff, they made us feel welcome and were very nice, especially Mark and Wanda at reception. It's a great spot from which to explore New York, would definitely go back. Parking isn't available at the hotel but they have a deal with a nearby parking place where you can drop your car (no exit privileges) for around 50$ / 24h.

title: Next Time again! ;-)
text: We enjoyed our stay in the Hilton Garden Inn very much! The staff was very polite and helpful, the room had place enough to fell comfortable and we had a refrigerator and a small micro and also a coffeemaker in it. That was very good for us because food isn't the cheepest in NYC, so we had the possibility to make a simple breakfast sometimes. Also the Hotel is very good located - near the Metro-Station South Ferry and the Staten Island Ferry-Station. It's located  in a more silent area and so for us perfekt to come 'home' in the evening after the day in the very busy city and locations uptown. The only thing we missed was a coat hook were clothes could have been hung up. But we would choose this hotel next time too and like to recommend it! Thanks!

title: Muy buen hotel
text: Este hotel es perfecto para una larga estadía porque la habitación es muy grande para la media y tiene microondas y nevera. Hay café gratis todas las mañanas en el lobby. Además el personal es sumamente atento en especial  Martín que nos ayudó en todo y habla español. Muchas gracias por todo.

title: Happy Hilton
text: Great location near to the Staten Island Ferry away from the hustle and bustle of uptown and only a twenty minute ride from Times Square via subway. Staff were all polite and courteous the accommodation was first class the breakfast provided served by a waiter was a fantastic way to start your day. Would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Bon rapport qualité prix
text:
J ai été accueilli par Nakita qui a était adorable et très professionnelle. La chambre est spacieuse propre calme , la literie est récente parfaite pour bien récupérer après une journée bien chargée. 
L'équipe du petit déjeuner est au petit soin .
L'hôtel est  dans un quartier calme le soir mais sécurisant même quant on rentre tard le soir. Le métro et les bus sont à proximité. 
Le chauffage qui sert aussi de climatisation est un peu bruillant mais un peu comme dans toutes hôtels aux États-Unis

title: Location, cleanliness, kindness
text: The hotel and our room were extremely clean and the staff were kind and very helpful. Our stay here made the trip even more memorable. The location was perfect for everything we wanted to experience, plus amazing view of the water from our room.

title: very good
text: the service was good,  the room is clean, and the employee are nice especially martin. The view from top floors are amazing . Everything is nearby.  They have a grill & bar whom serve good.  I recommend this place and to stay there.

title: Gutes Hotel mit hervorragender Anbindung
text: Super Anbindung an die wichtigsten Subway-Linien sowie Fähren. Trotzdem ist die Gegend abends und am Wochenende eher ruhig und es ist nicht sehr viel geboten. Das Zimmer war sauber. Das Frühstück war geschmacklich gut. Auswahl eher weniger. Personal freundlich, aber sehr hektisch und die Tische waren irgendwann alle mit gebrauchtem Geschirr voll. Zusammenfassend ein gutes Hotel für den NY-Trip.

title: Perfecto
text: Awesome place, a lado del ferry de la estatua de la libertad. Hay una salida de metro Justo al lado. 15 minutos caminando al World Trade Center. Es n barrio tranquilo. El hotel maravilloso, elegante, personal que ayuda y muy efectivo. Lo recomiendo

title: Great experience
text:
I had an excellent stay at this hotel!
Everyone was very nice and helpful, particularly Wanda Shantel. 
It is a very good location to go around and browse the City from Manhattan to Brooklyn. Great amenities.

title: very cool hotel in manhattan
text: it’s nice i like the mirror in the washroom and the setup is very nice. the workers also very nice. the room is very nice. tv also has relevant channels also very nice. hairdryer works very well very nice.

title: Buenísima experiencia
text:
Las instalaciones excelentes, buena ubicación, cerca del metro y del ferry de Staten Island. Lo mejor de todo, el staff del hotel, todos muy amables y profesionales!!! Agradecimientos especiales para Martin e Imran, quienes nos ayudaron en todo lo que necesitamos 
100% recomendado :)

title: Nice rooms, nice location, medium breakfast and stuff
text:
Very nice location and very clean rooms! The housekeeping service was very nice. 

Although the stuff and the food could be improved. 

Upon check in we asked for restaurant recommendations and the receptionist only told us that there are many places at the area without actually proving any help. This was very confusing for someone who visits N.Y for the first time. The breakfast was not so good for a 4 star hotel. There was the option of a buffet (which was limited) or the option of an ala cart dish (which were not so tasty). Most of the stuff were not interested in us. Everyday we were waiting for our juice even though we were done with the breakfast. Most of the days there was only 1 waiter at the breakfast area and you could not find an empty table to sit due to the dirty plates.

Considering all, I would recommend this hotel especially if they paid a little more attention to the details and the guests.

title: The perfect hotel in NYC!
text:
This a great hotel. We loved our visit.

It is well located; close to public transportation and in a safe and beautiful area.

The place is great; good food, comfortable, and clean. And has very good prices.

Lastly, the staff is amazing. They make you feel welcomed and go above and beyond to create an amazing experience. Kudos to Johanna and Steven in the restaurant, and to Martin and the other receptionist (who is from India but we don’t remember his name).

We will surely come back.

title: Super Lage, sehr freundliches Personal
text:
Das Personal, besonder Martin, Jaavena, Wanda und Emmanuel, ist sehr freundlich, sehr zuvorkommend und immer hilfsbereit. Man wird jederzeit freundlich begrüsst und verabschiedet und bekommt immer Hilfe, Auskunft und Unterstützung. Auch das nicht sichtbare Personal (Reinigungsdienst) ist top. Unser Zimmer war immer sehr sauber und alles in Ordnung. Leider wird jeden Tag alles gewechselt, obwohl wir das nie verlangt haben. Das ist eine Belastung für die Umwelt, die nicht sein müsste.
Die Lage des Hotels ist grossartig! Subway und Fähre in Gehdistanz und man kommt schnell überall hin. In Gehdistanz hat es auch ganz tolle Restaurants (Stone Street) und wir haben immer vorzüglich gegessen. Leider sehr teuer, aber das ist im Moment überall so. 
Essen im Hotel war okay, aber auswärts lohnt es sich auf jeden Fall mehr!
Frühstück haben wir nicht versucht, da sind wir immer mit der Subway nach Manhatten und haben dort wunderbar gefrühstückt.
Zimmer war im 29. Stock mit super Aussicht aufs Wasser. Leider etwas eng, Schränke vollgestopft mit Bügelbrett und Wolldecken, kaum anderer Stauraum. Leider. 
Zudem war es seher laut! Alle paar Sekunden hatte man das Gefühl, dass jemand eine Türe zuknallt. Wir haben dann festgestellt, dass die Geräusche von den direkt gegenüberliegenden Aufzügen kommen. Man hat uns ein anderes Zimmer angeboten, aber ohne die tolle Aussicht. Auf die wollten wir nicht verzichten. Zudem sind die Zimmer mit 2 getrennten Betten offenbar immer gegenüber den Aufzügen. Wir haben dann geprüft, ob das Geräusch weiter unten auch ist und da es weiter unten auch so war, haben wir auf den Zimmerwechsel verzichtet. Unser Zimmer war zudem mit einer Verbindungstür zum nächsten Zimmer. Im Zimmer nebenan waren sehr laute Frauen, die spätabends beim Heimkommen keine Rücksicht genommen haben. Aber das ist ja nicht das Problem des Hotels. Rücksichtslose Menschen gibt es überall. Einmal energisch klopfen hilft dann meist ;-)
Trotz den negativen Punkten würden wir dieses Hotel für NYC jederzeit wieder wählen und empfehlen.

title: Great
text: The hotel staff was very helpful and nice. I want to give a special thanks to Martin, Suantel, Jaquana, Emmanuel, Wandat, and Charles. They were all great and very helpful. They all helped with directions, transportation, and restaurants etc.

title: Great Stay/Customer service
text: An, Nakita, and Shantel were wonderful during my extended stay.  Spent 9 days and every day they always had smiles on the face.  Made me feel like I was at home and were extremely helpful with tips around the area with food recommendations.

title: Great
text:
Great hotel. 
An, Nilita, Shantel made our stay very perfect. It was really awesome. Good service, and great food. We spent nine days here. It made me feel that I was at home. The room was clean every day.

title: Great hotel
text: Great place to stay clean rooms and great service. Latía was the best. She helped us with everything. The hotel is fully stocked with everything you need to enjoy your travel. She helped make our experience super comfortable. I will definitely come back.

title: 10 out of 10
text: Amazing stay!! had a wonderful time and will definitely recommend this hotel to all travelers. Rooms and restaurants was great and the front desk staff was amazing, thank you Ann, Martin, Emmanuel and Latia

title: Great guest experience, would stay again!
text:
Nice room, great location, very close to multiple attractions, and Subway lines. 

It was our honeymoon and we had moved here halfway through our NYC trip do to a bad experience at another hotel chain. 

The staff at the Hilton Garden Inn wanted to turn around our trip and they did. It was great. The breakfast is very good, full restaurant not just a grab and go. I think they may have been a couple people short in the restaurant but that didn't stop the team there from working extra hard to provide a great experience.

The room was spacious for NYC standards and very clean and nice washroom and the turn down service was fantastic. 

Highly recommend anyone to stay here. They were very reasonably priced compared to the competition in NYC. We would stay again.

title: Perfect for my business trip!
text:
This hotel is right in the heart of where I wanted to be in the financial district, and hit the mark on the things I needed. The room was very clean, the bed was comfortable, the bathroom was nice, the thermostat worked well, etc.  The 2nd floor grill served a nice, made-to-order omlette, and there were multiple restaurants and bars very close by.

Best of all - the service was great! I really enjoyed my interactions with the staff members who made my stay very pleasant. Special shout out to Emmanuel and Wanda for taking care of me. I really appreciate your accommodations and making me feel valued as a Hilton Honors member. Thank you!

title: Muy bien todo
text: Muy bien todo, hotel situado en la punta sur de Manhattan, junto al embarcadero de los barcos a la Estatua de la Libertad y las islas Ellis y State y la entrada a la linea 1 del metro, que recorre la isla de Sur a Norte. Y Wall Street a un paso. Nos atendió Rafael estupendamente.

title: Preis Leistung sehr gut, aber einfach
text:
Das Hotel hat uns alles in allem sehr gut gefallen, vor allem das Thema Preis/leistung ist aus unserer Sicht hervorragend für NY.

Folgende positiven/negativen Elemente möchten wir teilen:

Positiv:
- Zimmergrösse – fast 25m2 ist für NY riesig
- Lage – Beim Batterypark, 4 Ubahnlinien resp. Farben in Gehdistanz
- Ferry Terminal vor der Haustüre
- Ruhig – im Vergleich zum Time Sq. Area deutlich weniger hektisch
- Frühstück – gute Auswahl, vor allem frische geschnittene Früchte (primär Melonen und Ananas) und gute Auswahl ein Speisen zum Bestellen (Pancakes, Eier, Waffeln etc.)
- Sauber
- Dusche mit Glasscheibe und nicht mit Vorhang und Wanne
- Food Hall im Gebäude Vis A Vis im UG, hat einen Chopt, Chipotle, Inder, Starbucks und 2-3 andere Takeaways und Restaurants, welche gut und preiswert sind

Negativ:
- Frühstück ist immer relativ hektisch und das Personal ist sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit, aber es fehlen konstant einfache Dinge (Milch, Besteck, Kaffee) während den Stosszeiten. Selbst Orangensaft und Apfelsaft muss man bestellen, hier wäre ein Dispenser sicher allen geholfen und würde das Personal ein wenig entlasten
- Samstag und Sonntags haben die Starbucks und Pret a Manger dieser Welt geschlossen, auch andere Restaurants sind dann zu, da es sich sehr dem Business orientiert – nicht negativ aber zu beachten

title: Excellent séjour
text:
Hôtel situé dans un quartier calme.  A côté du Ferry de Staten Island, de Battery Parc et du Taureau de Wall Street. Métro  à 2 min à pied. 
Chambre très propre et nettoyée tous les jours. 

Merci à Monsieur Martin-An Emmanuel pour sa gentillesse.

title: Expérience parfaite
text:
Hôtel très bien placé à 3 minutes à pied du ferry pour se rendre à staten island et voir la statue de la liberté et de wall street.
Le personnel est très sympathique et toujours aidant notamment Martin Emmanuel et Wanda. Ils donnent la possibilité de laisser les sacs gratuitement lors des jours de voyage afin de profiter pleinement de New York ! 
De plus la propreté est au rendez vous et les chambres et la literie est très bien ! Pour finir, la vue est incroyable. 
Nous avons donc adoré notre séjour au sein de cet hôtel je recommande !!

title: Wonderful location, clean hotel!
text: This hotel was in such a great location across the street from the Staten Island Ferry and a couple of blocks from subway.  The rooms were updated and very clean.  It is a pretty quiet part of town at night and on weekends because it is in the Financial District.  Great stay and I highly recommend!!!!

title: Tolles Hotel für einen Mädelstrip nach NYC
text: Sehr sauber, großes Zimmer für NYC, Blick auf South Ferry Terminal und aufs Wasser, wunderbar. Ein bisschen abseits vom Midtown-Trubel, sehr angenehm, aber trotzdem total zentral mit Ferry und mehreren Metros direkt vor der Tür. Super nette Rezeption, jedes Problem sofort gelöst, Taxi zum Flughafen organisiert, mit dem Gepäck geholfen. Tausend Dank besonders an Martin, der uns auch immer mega freundlich begrüßt und verabschiedet hat, ein wunderbar herzlicher Mann. Wir haben unseren Aufenthalt genossen und kommen gerne wieder, wenn wir wieder einmal in NYC sind.

title: Super recomendable
text: Excelente ubicación cerca de varias lineas de subte y del Ferry. Café disponible todas las mañanas. Martin y Rafael super amables, nos dieron tips y descuentos en actividades. La habitación espaciosa, el baño impecable

title: Great service- Victor M
text: Great stay.  Excellent customer service, specifically by Victor M. He and the team were kind enough to arrange for a late checkout.  This late checkout was not only for myself but also for 2 senior executives I work with. Very much appreciated!

title: Great value
text: From the time we arrived, Wanda and her team couldn't have been more helpful. She got us a great room, looking out at the water. The room is big, quiet, and comfortable. The property is close to the metro, so easy to get around. Great value for New York.

title: Excellent séjour
text: Excellent séjour dans cet hotel moderne situé au bout de manhattan. Peu de restaurants dans le quartier, mais le calme est de mise. Les chambres sont tres bien meublées et super propres. Un staff présent et serviable (mention spéciale à Wanda et Emmanuel) qui nous a été d'une grande aide au cours de notre séjour.

title: Home away from home.
text: Victor welcomed us upon arrival and made sure we had all we needed to get settled in. Rooms were clean and comfortable. As first time visitor, I had many questions. Martin, at the Concierge desk, was so very helpful to answer all my questions, concerns, directions for sightseeing and getting around NYC area...including the subway!  He really helped make our stay pleasant and enjoyable.

title: Great location for a work trip
text: The room is lovely, big and spotless, and with a good view of the river. It is an ideal location for visiting the work office and the financial district. Victor on the front desk has been super helpful throughout!

title: Great Stay!
text: I had a wonderful stay at this hotel with my family for two nights. It is updated, clean, and comfortable. We all slept so well! Our room was a great home base as we explored the city because we could walk to nearby restaurants and also right out to the subway across the street. The Staten Island Ferry is also directly across the street. The room had a mini refrigerator, microwave, and coffee maker. The view overlooking the water was a nice surprise and was relaxing when we weren’t out and about. All of our interactions with employees were positive, especially those with Emmanual and An at the front desk who were never too busy to offer a warm hello. We had a good experience eating breakfast in the restaurant too. I would definitely return for another NYC trip!

title: Great Family Weekend
text: I recently took my family to NYC for the weekend and stayed at this property.  The location was convenient as it was walking distance to major subway lines (1,2,N,R,4,5) and the Staten Island Ferry.  The room was clean and spacious.  It also had great views of the water.  My kids loved watching the boats and helicopters come into and out of the Manhattan.  The service was great too.  Emmanual and An at the front desk made check-in and check-out a breeze.  Highly recommend staying at this property and will do so again.

title: Excelente!!!!
text: Nos quedamos por lo cercano a la Estatua de la Libertad.  Todo cerca para ir caminando: TWC, Oculus, y muchos lugares interesantes.   El servicio del hotel es más de lo esperado.  Habitaciones y baño impecable.  Y su personal fue lo mejor.  Gracias a todos en especial a Martín, Wanda y Emmanuel.  Volveremos!!

title: Thank you!
text: I was met by Wanda and Emmanuel. Their customer service was top notch! There was a slight issue with my room and key card but they got the issue resolved in a blink of an eye.   Thanks to both of you!

title: Great hospitality
text: We came to stay at this hotel because I was getting married very close by my family was visiting from out of country. We had some issues checking in but An helped us with our check in and made sure my family were taken care of.

title: Lovely stay in the Financial District
text: I had a great stay at The Hilton Garden In in the Financial District. The rooms are very comfortable and the staff friendly and helpful. Special thanks to An, Martin and Emmanuel from the front desk they were very attentive and helped me change the room when I requested! Great stay! Thanks!

title: Amazing, accommodating hotel
text: Came here with my boyfriend to stay and I have to say that I love this hotel! Bathroom was super clean and modern. The room was spacious and very comfortable. I loved the view of the water as well! It was honestly perfect. I have no complaints

title: excelente hotel!
text: Muy buen ubicación del hotel, todo está muy limpio y cómodo, la vista del cuarto también muy bonita. La atención súper buena, especialmente a Victor An Wanda por la amabilidad y ayuda que nos brindó cuando apenas llegue con mi familia.

title: Ayuda en recepción muy buena
text: La atención y el servicio muy bueno!  Sobretodo de Víctor, Ann y Wanda que fueron muy amables en recepción. Los empleados en general son muy amables. El hotel está ubicado cerca a la estación de tren, excelente. La limpieza de la habitación fue la adecuada.

title: Magnifica atención
text: Fuimos atendidos en la recepción por An y Wanda y nos atendieron muy amablemente explicandonos todo lo necesario para nuestra estancia. Muy contentos con el servicio y el hotel. Muy buena localización.

title: The ultimate hack for staying in Manhattan
text:
The staff and service here was just incredible. Shout out to: Mark, Shantel, Martin, and Sara.

These people will take such good care of you, and make it the ideal spot for leisure or business in Manhattan.

I’ll be back every time.

title: Beautiful location, very clean
text:
An absolute amazing spot in downtown manhattan, just a minute walk to the battery where you can gaze at the Statue of Liberty. The rooms are very nice and clean.

The only thing is the fragrance or detergent they use. As soon as I walk in the door of the hotel my nose stuffs up and feel like I am breathing in pollen. The stuff they use is so strong. This might just be me, maybe I am allergic to whatever they use. But I do stay at a lot of hotels and this is a first.

title: Great location for exploring. Staff all friendly and helpful
text:
Great location to access Subway or downtown. Plenty of food and drink places locally and convenience stores.
Rooms can be a bit noisy even on higher floors but it’s New York, probably same all over. Rooms have plenty of space and nice breakfast available in morning so you can get on your way.

title: Really enjoyed my stay at this hotel. Very good stay and central location with quick access to subway.
text: The stay was fabulous. I really liked the way I was treated during my stay. Additionally, there is quick access to subways and that makes it easier to explore the citi. The price of the location beats other hotels around.

title: Convenient downtown location, very comfortable
text:
A very clean, spacious, comfortable room. Friendly, helpful staff. Of mention was Emmanuel (not sure I spelled that correctly) who was great over the phone and in person. 
The only disappointment was that the meal credit I received in recognition of my Diamond status was not enough to have breakfast. Otherwise, all good.

title: Nice staff and clean rooms
text: Nice and accommodating staff. The staff (An & Martin) answered all of our questions and gave us nice recommendations on what to do and not to do in New York City. The facilities are fine, the rooms are nice and clean and the view from the hotel is nice.

title: Excellent Service
text:
The hotel is clean, comfortable, quiet, and easy to get to! Just those would make it worth it for a business trip.

But the service was outstanding! An and Victor at the front desk were kind and helpful. We had had a booking issue with rooms that had been a pain to resolve online and they were able to fix it without issue!

Johanna and the restaurant staff were also wonderful!

title: Excellent customer experience
text: Check-in was very welcoming and was  made easy by An. Rooms are reasonably price for the area and very comfortable. My room had beautiful waterfront view and Located with many amenities near by. And easy of access to transportation.

title: Great experience here, willing come back again
text:
It was very cold day yesterday when I arrived the hotel. Anyway, the front desk people were welcoming me friendly, especially person who was helping me to check-in, An. 
An was very kind and explained to all my questions during the check-in process. The room I'm staying is amazing with no issues so far! I also notice that the food is great here too on the 2nd floor so I can't wait to try later while staying. Thank you An!

title: Fabulous!!
text:
We normally stay near Times Square but saw such good reviews about this hotel and its location we thought we’d give it a go. We originally booked for 4 nights but Virgin changed our flights so we had to book an extra night. 
So where should I start.. arrival to New York was later than expected due to snow in Manchester so the flight was delayed, it took  5 hours to get to Manchester airport (should have been 1.5hrs) but hey ho we got there in the end so can’t complain, thankfully the flight was delayed otherwise we’d have missed our hols! Hotel was fab, good size rooms with a large bathroom and great lighting in the bathroom too. Spotlessly clean with a wardrobe, TV, mini fridge and a microwave too! I’d requested a river view as we’d gone for our daughter’s 30th birthday and wanted to surprise her and I’m so glad to say the hotel accommodated my request and we all had a view of the Hudson River and the Staten Island Ferry terminal. Beds were super comfy, had the best nights sleep for a long time. Staff on reception were great but my only complaint is they were all unsure of the change in policy for hotels in the US around the food and beverage credit for Hilton Garden Inn properties. On booking I was informed we were entitled to a $10 food credit per day per person to use in the snack shop, this was instead of a free breakfast, however the staff thought this was per stay but after questioning this a couple of times they did honour it and took the charges off our room. As we’d arrived later than expected we didn’t do anything on the first night except get a drink in the restaurant, good service and prices not too bad. A few people had complained about the wait time for the lift but I can honestly say we waited less than a minute or two when we called the lift throughout our whole stay. 
Great location for the free Staten Island ferry and for the subway to Times Square. But I wish we’d turned left after leaving the hotel as a fab walk near the river which we only found out about on leaving. Within walking distance to 9/11 too. Highly recommend George’s for breakfast, around a 10 minute walk from hotel. Fabulous food and service and reasonable prices too, a definite win win. 
We booked our transfer back to JFK through Martin on reception, it cost a set fee of $95 and was definitely worth it, took all the stress away from getting a yellow cab or trying to negotiate the air train and we had a very comfortable journey back in a luxurious car with a fabulous chauffeur too. 
We will definitely stay here again, one of the best hotels for space and cleanliness and great staff too, a special mention to Martin, An and Jaquana for making our stay memorable x

title: Great Customer Service and Great Location
text:
All of the hotel customer service were amaizing and kind. Imran and Martin help us with our stay and we are so thankful. 
Everyday all are very clean, the restaurant have a good food and service. Great location, transportation to everywhere and very beautiful area. Very safe and quietly compare to Manhattan. 

Thank You!

title: Great Stay, Great Location, Great Hotel!
text:
Spent two nights at this hotel this past January 2023. We needed to check in one hour early. Raphael and Shantel were more than happy with assisting us with our check in.
This area of NYC has a hole other vibe, many things to explore! 15 minute walk to the 9-11 Museum. Subway entrance a block from the hotel. The hotel is well kept and clean! After a long day in the city we stopped at the hotel's bar, where we met Steven, who was an expert at his craft. I can not wait to visit again!

title: Nice Hotel
text: I enjoyed my stay at Hilton Garden Inn. The room was clean and just perfect for my two-day stay. I think only the restaurant can be improved during the breakfast. There are not many options in the buffet and they need more staff. Other than that everything was perfect. Also, Martin was very helpful helping me with the check in, to store my luggage and by ordering me a taxi to the airport. Top service.

title: EVERYTHING
text:
Miss. Jaquanna and Miss. Shantel at the front desk/customer service, these two ladies outstanding, they helped with with all questions I had and my concerns about my stay. Miss. Jaquanna I’m sorry for my annoying 1000 questions but girl your the bomb. I thank you for your patience, kindness and outstanding customer service. From both ladies. There was another women at the front who I didn’t catch her name but if Miss. Jaquanna remembers I thank the women as well and also deserves that $25 bonus, PERIOD.  Also to the manager I thank you for allowing the accommodations for my staff. You have no idea how much that helped. 

Will I be coming back…Uhhhhh yasss stay stay stay Here it’s great 😊

title: Super séjour
text: L’hotel est parfaitement situé, il est propre et on s’y sent comme chez nous grace aux agent a l’acceuil , la chambre est propre et merci a Latia pour ses services et son sourire chaleureux qu’importe l’heure

title: Large rooms, great staff (thank you especially to An)  great location for Statue of Liberty tour
text: Spacious rooms with water views, very professional staff - attentive, responsive and courteous. Thank you to An in particular who helped us with check in and went over and above to help meet our needs. Breakfast - can highly recommend the made-to-order omelettes. Great location for Statue of Liberty tours as within walking distance of the ferry. Walking distance to South Ferry subway gives good access to other NYC tourist attractions.

title: Great location, budget friendly
text: It is perfectly located just opposite the Staten Island Ferry terminal (which has a few fast food outlets, if you get hungry late at night!) and the South Ferry Metro station. This station is on Line 1 which is perfect if you are heading to all the main tourist hotspots. Just around the corner is the Charging Bull statue and there are dozens of small bars and restaurants within a 5 minute walk. Inside it is a basic Hilton Garden Inn - there is a small (and v expensive) 'store cupboard' with some chocolate/drinks by reception, and free tea/coffee each morning in the lobby. The rooms are basic but very good, clean and well presented. I would happily stay here again as it is such  great location.

title: Thanks to the staff for a great stay time!
text: I would love to thank personally thank An for helping us check-in at such late time and assisting us to enjoy the hotel services at the maximum! She is great!!! Also, I would love to thank Wanda, Emanuel and Victor for their resolution of my problems with the bathroom. I stayed in the hotel with my wife, and the bathroom door was not properly closing, which made it awkward using it. The staff was great relocating me to the different room with everything I needed! Also, I would love to thank cleaning personnel for doing their work so well!

title: Perfect stay in NYC
text:
The Rooms are very clean and the bed was comfortable. The Hotel is located in the financial district with subway and bus stations closeby. We felt very safe in this neighbourhood, even at night. 
We had a nice experience with the Personal.
Especially Jaquana and Martin who were very friendly and made our stay even more enjoyable. 
It was a pleasure staying with you.

title: Good Location to visit New York
text:
Rooms are good space, beds are pleasant to sleep, good Coffee. Just one thing, we stayed for four nights and two nights we had to call to front desk to claim because nobody  cleaned the room.
I want to congratulate Martin Jaquana for his excellent service.

Emmanuel and Wanda are loveliest people I have ever met. Were very kind upon welcome and explained everything to us well. Nice hotel, nice staff, excellent stay. The restaurant and candy shop cones in handy.

title: Amazing
text: Staff are extremely polite. Received great support from Emmanuel and Wanda, they made sure we were satisfied with our stay and gave us some travel guides to help us find things to do here in New York.  Great amenities included. Will most definitely visit this hotel again.

title: HGI NY
text: Very good hotel for short staying in NY, perfect localisation, very friendly staff, good meal , absolutly amazing NY cheese cake, good choice for everybody who stay few days- perfect localisation very close to subway

title: Recommend staying
text:
Great stay - room was tidy, spacious and staff friendly. We really enjoyed complimentary coffee during morning hours and very good access to subway (only 3min walk).
Thank you Martin, Chantel and Imran for your help!

title: Amazing hotel with excellent location and great staff!
text: Our stay was just fantastic! The hotel definitely met our expectations and it was very clean and well located! All the staff were very nice but we have to thank Martin especially due to all the help he gave us, he was very kind and helpful! We would stay in this hotel again!!!

title: Stay during Christmas
text: I stayed at Hilton Garden Inn for 3 nights due to my flight cancellation during Christmas. The hotel is right in front of the South Ferry port and 5 mins walk distance from subway Line 1 and R which can take me anywhere. The room was clean and equipped with all essential equipment. The front desk staffs, Martin and Mark were nice and friendly in assisting my check in and checkout. One recommendation I have is for the TVs. It would be much better if the TVs are smart TVs that I can forecast movies or videos using my phone.

title: NYC for Christmas - great stay
text: The service at Hilton Garden Inn was excellent. Especially Martin, Emanuel and Wanda provided a great service and handled all our requests very well. Rooms are nice and the beds are so comfy. Rooms get cleaned everyday. The location ia great too, as you can reach every main attraction by subway, which is located very close.

title: Hilton Garden Inn NYC Financial Center/Manhattan Downtown
text: The best part of this hotel is it's location. There is a lot going on in the Financial District and I thought it was a lot cleaner/safer than parts of Midtown or the villages. Fraunces Tavern and The Dead Rabbit right next to this hotel (stumbling distance) are absolutely incredible restaurants and pubs. I would stay at this hotel the next time I have to work around Wall Street just for this reason. It is also across the street from the Staten Island Ferry. The rooms are decent sized for NYC standards. You get a F&B credit per day as a diamond member. I used this for breakfast, which was pretty good for the cooked to order items. It is NYC prices but the F&B credit helps with that. The rooms were clean and comfortable. Overall I enjoyed my stay primarily for the location and decent value. They offered the government rate, which can be hard to find during December/Christmas time in the city.

title: Excelente atencion
text: Hotel muy bien ubicado, brinda, además todas las comodidades que se necesitan. Personal muy agradable y atento, destacando al señor Martín, realmente él hace la diferencia, servicial, atento, muy agradable y siempre dispuesto a que el pasajero se sienta bien, y habla español, muy importante para los turistas que no manejamos inglés.

title: Excelente Servicio
text: Excelente servicio y localización! Limpieza de primera. Regresaría en cada visita a NY. Agradecida con Rafael, nos hizo la estadía mucho más fácil con su servicio excelente y sus consejos. Para nosotras fue un cinco estrellas ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

title: Great Stay
text:
Had a great stay, staff service is excellent! 
Delicious breakfast served, recommend. Beautiful water front view from our rooms. 
Martin and Jaquana were very helpful to my family and I. Will definitely stay here next time.

title: Good choice in the FD
text:
I can highly recommend this hotel. It is very close to a couple of subway stations. The rooms are all a good size, are very clean and have good sound insulation. 
I didn't have any meals so I can't comment on that. 
The staff are very helpful and really to accommodate any requests. Special thanks to An, Alex, Martin and Emanuel.

title: NY weekend
text: Great staff. Very friendly and helpful with NY information. Modern, clean and well set up. Good sized rooms. Location is good, close to China Town and some cool pubs and restaurants. Compared to other NY good value hotels this is a great choice.

title: ottima posizione per visitare Manhattan senza essere immersi nel caos
text: Il pregio è dato dalla posizione. Vicinissimo alla metro, in una zona molto tranquilla e strategica per visitare MAnhattan. Camera piccola, ma letto spazioso e comodo. Pulito e silenzioso se si esclude il rumore del clima. Apprezzatissimo il caffè alla mattina disponibiole gratutitamente. Qualche pecca nei servizi: un giorno si sopo dimenticati di rifare la camera, un altro giorno non hanno messo sapone e schampo e hanno prtato via quelli inziati... strano per un Hilton, ma per il resto il soggiorno è stato più che positivo. Se torno non escludo di tornarci.

title: Best place in Manhattan Downtown
text: Equipe de recepção simpática, atenciosa e muito educada. Quarto grande e equipado com frigobar e microondas. Elevadores ágeis. Localizado próximo a três estações de metrô e dos ferrys para as ilhas. Vista do quarto maravilhosa. Lençóis e toalhas em perfeitas condições. Definitivamente me senti em um ambiente muito acolhedor e sem a sensação de estar "em hotel de rede".

title: Great place to stay!
text: The staff in this hotel made you feel really welcome. They are friendly, helpful, and accommodating. The location is great, with a subway station just a few minutes away. The hotel is clean and the bed is comfy. The price was reasonable for this time of year. We had positive experience while staying 6 nights. The only negative thing I have to say is the pancakes I ordered to go one day. It was pretty burnt so it was chewy to eat. I didn’t bother complaining since we were all the way up on the 24th floor. I lived in NYC and I’ve come back many times, staying at different hotels and AirBnBs.  I would definitely stay here again.

title: Muy bien situado
text:
Estuvimos 7 días alojados, está justo en frente del ferri a Staten Island y cerca de varias líneas de metro, muy bien comunicado y justo al lado del world tarde center.
Martín nos ayudó en todo lo que necesitamos, fue muy atento.

title: Experiencia
text:
Muy buen hotel y el trato de sus empleados es excelente. Tienen agua caliente y hacen el room service todos los días. Martin desde que llegamos nos trató excelente, igual que su compañero Emanuel. 

Recomendado

title: TOP VACANZA !
text: Tutto fantastico, ottima posizione, camera sempre pulita brave le ragazze delle camere, comodo e tutti molto cortesi ma in particolare modo MARTIN e Rafael che sono stati molto cortesi e simpatici nel dare info sempre sorridenti GRAZIE A PRESTO ITALIAA

title: Great weekend at a quiet and relaxing hotel with excellent views and great location.
text: We recently stayed at The Hilton Garden Inn in Downtown Manhattan. This hotel is conveniently located within walking distance to many of the NYC attractions. Easily accessible by train, bus and ferry. Upon arrival the lobby and check in area were nice clean with many seating areas overlooking the river and terminal. Staff was friendly and eager to help. They even helped my friend with the wifi on her phone. Staff spoke Spanish which is a plus to many of the Spanish speaking tourist who visit the area. Check was easy and fast. In the rooms the beds and pillows were very comfortable and clean. We had dinner and drinks at the Garden Grille and bar. Staff was welcoming and accommodating. Service was fast. We enjoyed the Ana I got drinks especially the coconut mojito and sangria. We found great places to eat nearby. We felt very safe walking everywhere. Overall we had a great experience and enjoyed this hotel very much. I highly recommend this hotel.

title: Superb downtown location in clean, modern, comfy hotel
text:
Superb location with several subway lines within a 5 minute walk, along with the Staten Island Ferry terminal and ferries to Brooklyn and Queens. 

Staff were very friendly and helpful and the hotel was super clean. 

The temperature of the shower was quite temperamental and went hot/cold fairly frequently which was a bit of a pain.

title: Short visit to NYC
text:
Chef Shawn did a great job feeding our group at breakfast.  We were there a very short time, but the restaurant was very cordial and accommodating.
The beds and pillows were the best I have ever encountered in any hotel.

title: Muy buena localización y atención
text: Muy buena ubicación, con variedad de restaurantes, actividades y numerosos accesos a las distintas líneas de metro a menos de 5 minutos. Las habitaciones también estaban muy bien y buen servicio de limpieza. Cabe destacar el servicio de café gratuito por las mañanas y el trato y amabilidad de Martín Chantel en recepción, agradecimientos por su atención y servicio.

title: Great hotel & amazing Housekeeping staff - especially Antonio!!
text: Awesome hotel- especially for business travel. The rooms were super clean, well appointed, great amenities - everything you need and want plus more space then you typically get in a NYC hotel. Great breakfast options, and a super comfortable bed. But most importantly, and best of all - was the staff. From the front desk, and bell man, to the entire house keeping staff. Everyone was warm and helpful and went above and beyond to care of me and my team. Antonio Martinez from the Housekeeping team, was incredible. I accidentally left a blouse and dress in the closet, and all it took was a quick phone call and he located it, and sent it back to me in California within a day. Amazing! Thank you Antonio and Hilton team!

title: Nice quiet hotel
text:
I stayed in this hotel on my first visit ever to the US. After researching numerous options I decided to choose this hotel taking into consideration the location as I prefer a quiet neighbourhood away from the nuisance of tourist areas such as Times Square, etc. I really enjoyed my stay in this hotel, it's very nice, cozy and my room was impeccably clean and very comfortable. The location is really amazing if you are looking for a good night sleep. The hotel is walking distance to numerous subway stations from where you can go anywhere in NYC without any hassle. For our convenience, the hotel has a self-serve laundry room with a minimal fee. The complimentary tea and coffee bar in the lobby is really appreciated. Last but not least, I'd personally like to compliment Ms. Tyra in the front desk for her professionalism and quality service. She really took good care of me. She even upgraded me to a nice water view room! And thanks to Mr. Michael too for his assistance. I highly recommend this hotel.

Thank you for taking time reading my review!

Regards,
Adel Al Kooheji
Kingdom of Bahrain

title: Perfect Bed and Eggs🤔
text: Room was comfortable and up to date. I’d like to have the mattress and pillow at home😀.  The Garden Grille and Bar are first class. Chef Shawn cooked wonderful eggs and red skin potatoes for breakfast; server Joanna was very attentive to each extra need; and in the sports bar Alexandra was an attentive bartender.  This is place to stay near Statin Island Ferry building and Battery Park.

title: Ruined a nice stay by overcharging me once I checked out
text:
Originally I only had nice things to say about this hotel.

Unfortunately a week after I left the hotel added £400 to my original bill after checkout.

I messaged them about this and they said the charges would drop off, 2 weeks later and they're still on my account, and after looking at my bill and pointing out charges for taxi's I never got had been added they have stopped replying to my messages.

Very unprofessional and now all the good things I had to say about this hotel are gone.

If you stay here do yourself a favor and keep an eye on your bills and charges and if possible pay in cash!

title: Peccato per qualche imprevisto
text:
Hotel nella zona di Wall Street a ridosso della metropolitana (red line) che collega comodamente e in circa 20 minuti alla zona più turistica e centrale della città. Le stanze sono piccole ma ben attrezzate e con bagno moderno e funzionale. Però ci sono state un po' di cose non all'altezza di una catena Hilton. 
Innanzitutto, non ho avuto i punti HiltonHonors per il fatto di aver prenotato tramite booking e non tramite la app di Hilton (e già questo mi ha un po' infastidita perché andrebbe specificato meglio). Inoltre ho trovato una colazione abbastanza povera rispetto al costo e anche visivamente poco curata. 
Ultima nota davvero dolente è che una mattina uscendo dalla mia stanza c'era una persona che dormiva a terra nel corridoio. Ho segnalato la cosa alla reception e mi sarei aspettata un trattamento diverso (magari almeno delle scuse!!). Poco dopo ho anche chiesto aggiornamenti e mi hanno liquidata velocemente dicendo che avevano provveduto a chiamare l'ambulanza. Sinceramente, non mi sarei aspettata una gestione di questo tipo in un hotel Hilton (altrimenti me ne sarei andata in un ostello a pochi dollari a notte). Mi sono domandata che tipo di sorveglianza e controlli ci siano per permettere che una persona dorma in un corridoio senza che nessuno se ne accorga.
Per tutti questi motivi devo purtroppo bocciare questo hotel.

title: A Gem in Lower Manhattan
text: Having been a regular at Hilton Time Square before it closed, i have searched for a good replacement! I have tried a few other hotels in the Mid Town/Lower Manhattan area and found nothing similar until now - HGI Financial Center is a Gem in the lower Manhattan area - Hotel is located centrally to everything you need (including the excellent Fraunces Tavern and other bars within walking distance, the subway is a few minutes walk and the Staten Island Ferries are 2 mins away) and some great food places too. Staff at HGI Financial center were friendly, professional and very helpful - a real credit to Mark Dacres (the Guest Service manager) and his team. The restaurant food and breakfast was excellent, credit to Joab the Chef and his team. The bar was a great place to relax. Overall in summary courteous staff, clean hotel and room, good hotel would definitely recommend it

title: Would Stay Again and Again
text:
I have no complaints, everything was great.  Courteous staff, clean hotel and room, hotel in great condition.
Hotel is located on the water in the financial district, very close to Staten Island Ferry, Battery Park, Statue of Liberty and the Brooklyn bridge.

title: Great location and nice views
text: We stayed here on the weekend to visit fiends, what I liked more was the location as you can do plenty of things just walking around. The room has the new modern bathroom setup but the sliding Beth room door kept opening as was impossible to close. Other than that all was clean, neat and expensive

title: Hotel is AMAZING!
text: The staff were awesome and very accommodating! Gym was great to get a workout in. The location is absolutely perfect for a getaway. The hotel was very clean and the rooms very comfortable! Was the perfect spot for my stay!

title: Comfortable and Welcoming
text:
Really liked my stay in this hotel. The staff was really accommodating. The bed was comfortable and the room was neat. The doors of the room were a bit too heavy but I’m not sure who to attribute that too (always double check that it closed properly!)

Would definitely consider staying here again when I’m in town.

title: Great trip let down by rude service at the end
text: Good hotel - clean, in convenient location. Good bar manager and restaurant staff. However I asked for a taxi at 9am to take me to the airport after I finished work and I was told 3-4 times over the period of an hour that is was coming, but it never turned up. I had to get an Uber an hour later and was quite a stressful journey getting to the airport, when it shouldn’t have been.

title: Loved this hotel!
text: Absolutely wonderful. The staff is so friendly and helpful. The room was amazing! Super clean. We stayed in room 2205 and enjoyed watching the boats in the mornings. It’s a short 15 min walk to Oculus for great dining and Nobu is another restaurant nearby I highly recommend.

title: Amazing Service
text: From the moment we arrived at the hotel we were received by smiles and friendly faces.  Everyone (no exception) was so helpful and kind.  We were a party of 7 and they let us do advance check-in to get one room earlier than expected as we came from a long international night flight.  The service was quick and super efficient, Martin Saguana was charming and helped us with all our questions and with our luggage in and out the day we left (long story).  The hotel is clean and well maintained, and the room is small but ok for New York standards.  The location is convenient, you are 4 minutes away from the subway and Bryant Park.  It is a little overpriced but isn't all the hotels in New York like that?  You get more for your money than in other similarly priced hotels.

title: Wonderful hotel! Would definitely return!
text:
From the moment we checked in, this hotel was a wonderful stay. The two ladies at the desk during check in (sorry I did not get their names) were incredibly kind of sweet. Every night or day that we returned, she always made it a point to welcome us back. It was very clean from the lobby, elevators, and also the room. I felt like the rooms were spacious by “NY standards”. We had two connecting rooms. I didn’t hear anything from any other room during our entire stay there! It was so quiet and peaceful to come back to after a long day of walking around NYC. 

The bed was very comfortable, however, the pillows were extremely flat. I was able to take a couple from our connecting room; otherwise, I would have had to ask for more. 

We did have to take the subway often, but the “1” train is right near the hotel, and that will pretty much drop you off near any kind of tourist stop you might need.  We opted to do a little walking instead of trying to take multiple subways. 

I will definitely stay here again if I ever decide to return to NYC.

title: Accueil franchement décevant / propreté discutable
text:
Check in tardif (minuit) rapide. 2 chambres à 10 étages d'écart malgré mon appel la semaine précédente pour demander de nous mettre ensemble. Grosse déception en arrivant dans la chambre. Ménage + que discutable. Miettes au sol, taches noires sur les draps blancs et le summum, traces d urine sur la cuvette des toilettes. Réponse de la réception quand je leur signale "pas d'autre chambre disponible, nous enverrons quelqu'un demain pour faire le ménage"... même pas un 'sorry'.... 
Sinon, emplacement top pour le tourisme
Petit dej un peu cher pour la quantité, mieux vaut trouver un diner...

title: Freundliches Personal, Lage top sonst flopp
text:
Zuerst einmal war es das freundlichste Personal das wir in New York in einem Hotel hatten und wir waren schon oft in der Stadt.
Danke dafür.
Nach einigen Unannehmlichkeiten in unserem Zimmer, konnten wir es sofort wechseln. 
Die Zimmer brauchen unbedingt eine Renovierung, die Schränke Schließen schlecht, in den Kleiderschrank ist alles reingestopft, das es herausfällt wenn man ihn öffnen möchte. 
Die Klimaanlage ließ sich nicht regulieren, es war sehr kalt.
Die Reinigungstruppe kommt vielleicht, vielleicht auch nicht. Um 16:00 Uhr braucht auch keiner mehr sauber machen, wir haben uns an jedem einzelnen Tag, die Handtücher selbst holen müsse.
Nachdem in der Gegend vermutlich Corona geschuldet, kaum ein Laden nach 20:00 Uhr mehr geöffnet hat, wollten wir uns eine Flasche Wasser im Hotelshop kaufen, danke nein der Preis für 1Liter Wasser ist unverschämt frech. (10$) In einem günstigeren Hotel in Washington gab es Wasser rund um die Uhr gratis. Hier sollte sich die Hiltongruppe eine Scheibe von abschneiden.
Die Lage ist dagegen super, sämtliche Metrostationen, Ferrys usw. sind schnell erreichbar und wie gesagt das freundlichste Personal überhaupt.

title: Great stay
text:
My wife and I decided spur of the moment to celebrate our anniversary with an overnight stay in NYC since we live in the burbs but both work in Manhattan. 

The staff at the hotel were very friendly and helpful, most notably Lateya and Ameena. There was an issue with our safe and they came right away to take care of it, helped us get a cab when we were in a bit of a rush to make an event on time. 

We chose a river view which was mostly obscured by the office building across the street but it was still ok. The room while a bit small and cozy was very comfortable and I imagine that's a NYC thing.

Would definitely stay again!

title: Great location , great water views from room
text:
The hotel is actually in a great location and some rooms will give you a lovely view, however the hotel felt pretty chaotic ( more so than other NYC hotels at this tier ). There is construction in the area and all the construction workers park their cars in front of the hotel which made it super inconvenient to check in , drop bags and then go to park the car ( they have no valet).
Also , there was one guy at the front desk that was on the phone every time for the 3 days I was there - this was annoying because he never acknowledges you when you are waiting at front - even for a simple 3 second question.
Also they told me i could call them when i was ready for a cab , of course I called the front desk to no answer ( the guy was probably on the other line again!). But that was fine cause it was new york and there were multiple cabs a block away at the staten island ferry terminal. 
The room was good , i got a water view room and even tho its partial view due to buildings , was still nice ( i was on 27th floor).
Coffee in the room was horrendous as you would expect , and the bathroom has a small leak and very little hooks for towels. It was nice that there was a safe, microwave and fridge in the room.
Also its 15 mins walk to south street seaport where there are tons of outdoor restaurant , bars , concert venues etc.
I would prob stay here again but maybe in an off-season so it can be less chaotic.

title: Room with a water view
text: We stayed at this location for five nights and we truly loved our stay. The water view from our room on the 28th floor was amazing and we were treated well for being Hilton Honors Gold members. All touristy stuff like Battery Park, Stock Exchange, Charging Bull, and Museums were within walking distance and there were lots of options to eat around. Staten Island ferry and Statue of Liberty tours are next door. The location is also very safe and hotel rooms are clean, sufficiently big (with NYC standards), and well appointed. I wish the construction around the hotel was not there but that is not a big deal and is beyond the control of the hotel. Overall, we enjoyed our stay and we will come back again.

title: Poor room service, shoddy room configuration
text: There was no maid service at all on 2 of our 10 day stay.  When asked about this at the front desk, the explanation was service must be specifically requested due to COVID.  This was not explained at check-in.
